#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = (a); i <= (b); ++i)

using namespace std;
using namespace YangTY::fastIO;
using ll = long long;
const int maxn = 5e5 + 5, maxm = 3e6 + 5;
const ll INF = 1e18;

int n, m;
int head[maxn], cnte;
ll p[maxn];
struct Edge {
    int to, nxt;
    ll w;
} e[maxm << 1];

void add(int u, int v, ll w) {
    e[++cnte] = {v, head[u], w}, head[u] = cnte;
    return;
}

struct Interval {
    ll l, r;
    Interval(ll _l = 0, ll _r = 0) : l(_l), r(_r) {}
    il friend Interval operator&(const Interval &x, const Interval &y) {
        return Interval(max(x.l, y.l), min(x.r, y.r));
    }
};

struct Node {
    ll k, b;
    Node(ll _k = 0, ll _b = 0) : k(_k), b(_b) {}
    il ll get(ll x) const {return k * x + b;}
    il Interval solve(ll x) const {
        if (k > 0) return Interval(-b / k, (x - b) / k);
        else return Interval((x - b) / k, -b / k);
    }
    il friend Node operator+(const Node &a, const Node &b) {return Node(a.k + b.k, a.b + b.b);}
    il friend Node operator-(const Node &a, const Node &b) {return Node(a.k - b.k, a.b - b.b);}
} w[maxn];
int vis[maxn];

il ll cmp(const Node &x, const Node &y) {
    if (x.k == y.k) return (x.b == y.b) ? INF : -INF;
    if ((y.b - x.b) % (x.k - y.k)) return -INF;
    else return (y.b - x.b) / (x.k - y.k);
}

pair<ll, ll> bfs(int s) {
    ll z = INF;
    w[s] = Node(1, 0);
    queue<int> q;
    vector<int> vec;
    q.push(s), vec.push_back(s);
    vis[s] = 1;
    while (!q.empty()) {
        int u = q.front(); q.pop();
        for (int i = head[u]; i; i = e[i].nxt) {
            int &v = e[i].to;
            if (!vis[v]) {
                w[v] = Node(0, e[i].w) - w[u];
                vis[v] = 1;
                vec.push_back(v);
                q.push(v);
            } else {
                ll tmp = cmp(w[v], Node(0, e[i].w) - w[u]);
                if (tmp == -INF) return {-INF, -INF};
                else if (tmp != INF) {
                    if (z != INF && tmp != z) return {-INF, -INF};
                    z = tmp;
                }
            }
        }
    }
    if (z != INF) {
        ll ans = 0;
        for (auto &x : vec) {
            ll tmp = w[x].get(z);
            if (tmp < 0 || tmp > p[x]) return {-INF, -INF};
            ans += tmp;
        }
        return {ans, ans};
    } else {
        Interval ans(-INF, INF);
        Node tmp(0, 0);
        for (auto &x : vec) ans = ans & w[x].solve(p[x]), tmp = tmp + w[x];
        if (ans.l > ans.r) return {-INF, -INF};
        ll ans1 = tmp.get(ans.l), ans2 = tmp.get(ans.r);
        if (ans1 > ans2) swap(ans1, ans2);
        return {ans1, ans2};
    }
}

int main() {
    is >> n >> m;
    FOR(i, 1, n) is >> p[i];
    FOR(i, 1, m) {
        int u, v, w; is >> u >> v >> w;
        w = p[u] + p[v] - w;
        add(u, v, w), add(v, u, w);
    }
    ll ans1 = 0, ans2 = 0;
    FOR(i, 1, n) if (!vis[i]) {
        auto tmp = bfs(i);
        if (tmp.first == -INF) return puts("NIE"), 0;
        ans1 += tmp.first, ans2 += tmp.second;
    }
    os << ans1 << ' ' << ans2 << '\n';
    return 0;
}

item.title: CodeChef CyclesAndColorings
item.description:
Description

ç»™å®šä¸€å¼ ç®€å•æ— å‘è¿é€šå›¾ï¼Œ\(n\le 10^5\)ï¼Œ\(m\le 2\times 10^5\)ï¼Œå®Œæˆå¦‚ä¸‹ä¸¤é¡¹ä»»åŠ¡å…¶ä¸€ï¼š

  • åˆ æ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå¥‡ç¯ï¼Œä½¿å¾—å›¾ä»ç„¶è¿é€šã€‚
  • å°†è¯¥å›¾å››æŸ“è‰²ã€‚

Solution

ç¬¬ä¸€é—®å¯ä»¥è€ƒè™‘éšä¾¿ä¸€æ£µç”Ÿæˆæ ‘ï¼Œç„¶åè€ƒè™‘éæ ‘è¾¹ä¸­æœ‰æ— å¥‡ç¯ï¼Œæœ‰åˆ™åˆ æ‰ç›´æ¥è¾“å‡ºã€‚

å¦åˆ™éæ ‘è¾¹çš„è¿é€šå—æ˜¯å¼ äºŒåˆ†å›¾ï¼Œæ ¹æ®äºŒåˆ†å›¾çš„äºŒæŸ“è‰²å’Œæ ‘çš„æ·±åº¦å¥‡å¶æ€§æ¥æŸ“å³å¯ã€‚

å¯¹äºéæ ‘è¾¹çš„éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ‰¾å…¶ dfs ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘ï¼Œç„¶åä¼šå‘ç°åªæœ‰è¿”ç¥–è¾¹å¯èƒ½è¿æˆå¥‡ç¯ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­ä¹‹å³å¯ã€‚

Implementation

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define il inline
#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = (a); i <= (b); ++i)

using namespace std;
const int maxn = 1e5 + 5, maxm = 2e5 + 5;
vector<int> G[maxn], T[maxn];
int n, m;

struct UnionFind {
    int fa[maxn];
    void init() {
        FOR(i, 1, n) fa[i] = i;
        return;
    }
    int find(int u) {return u == fa[u] ? u : fa[u] = find(fa[u]);}
    il bool merge(int u, int v) {
        u = find(u), v = find(v);
        if (u == v) return 0;
        return fa[u] = v, 1;
    }
} ufs;

int dep[maxn], vis[maxn], fa[maxn];

void dfs(int u) {
    vis[u] = 1;
    for (auto &v : G[u]) if (!vis[v]) {
        dep[v] = dep[u] + 1;
        fa[v] = u;
        dfs(v);
    }
}

bool findOddCircle() {
    memset(vis, 0, sizeof vis);
    FOR(i, 1, n) if (!vis[i]) {
        dep[i] = 1;
        fa[i] = 0;
        dfs(i);
    }
    FOR(u, 1, n) for (auto &v : G[u]) {
        if (!((dep[u] + dep[v]) & 1)) {
            cout << "2\n";
            if (dep[u] < dep[v]) swap(u, v);
            cout << (dep[u] - dep[v] + 1);
            for (int x = u; x != fa[v]; x = fa[x]) cout << ' ' << x;
            cout << '\n';
            return true;
        }
    }
    return false;
}

int col[maxn];

void dfsColor(int u, int c) {
    col[u] = c;
    for (auto &v : T[u]) if (col[v] == -1) dfsColor(v, c ^ 1);
    return;
}

int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int test; cin >> test;
    while (test--) {
        cin >> n >> m;
        FOR(i, 1, n) {
            vector<int>().swap(G[i]);
            vector<int>().swap(T[i]);
        }
        ufs.init();
        FOR(i, 1, m) {
            int u, v; cin >> u >> v;
            if (ufs.merge(u, v)) T[u].emplace_back(v), T[v].emplace_back(u);
            else G[u].emplace_back(v), G[v].emplace_back(u);
        }
        if (!findOddCircle()) {
            memset(col, -1, sizeof col);
            FOR(i, 1, n) if (col[i] == -1) dfsColor(i, 0);
            cout << "1\n";
            FOR(i, 1, n) cout << ((col[i] << 1) + (dep[i] & 1)) + 1 << (i == n ? '\n' : ' ');
        }
    }
    return 0;
}

item.title: TopCoder12418 BoardPainting
item.description:
Description

\(n \times m\) çš„ç½‘æ ¼é‡Œæœ‰ä¸€äº› # å·éœ€è¦æ¶ˆé™¤ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡å¯ä»¥é€‰ä¸€æ®µæ¨ªå‘æˆ–çºµå‘çš„è¿ç»­ # å·ä¸€èµ·æ¶ˆæ‰ï¼Œä¸èƒ½é€‰æ‹©ç©ºæ ¼æˆ–è€…å·²æ¶ˆé™¤çš„æ ¼å­ã€‚é—®æœ€å°‘éœ€è¦æ¶ˆé™¤å‡ æ¬¡ã€‚

\(n,m\le 50\)ã€‚

Solution

åœ¨æœ€ä¼˜çš„ç­–ç•¥ä¸‹ï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰æ¶ˆé™¤æ“ä½œçš„å°½å¤´çš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®è¦ä¹ˆæ˜¯ç©ºæ ¼ï¼ˆæˆ–è€…è¾¹ç•Œï¼‰ï¼Œè¦ä¹ˆæ˜¯ä»å¦ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹å‘åˆ·çš„ç‚¹ã€‚

æ‰€ä»¥è€ƒè™‘æ•°ç«¯ç‚¹ï¼Œå˜æˆé›†åˆåˆ’åˆ†é—®é¢˜ï¼Œç”¨æœ€å°å‰²æ¥æ±‚è§£ã€‚

è·Ÿ \(S\) è¿é€šè¡¨ç¤ºè¿™ä¸ªæ ¼å­æ˜¯ç«–ç€çš„ï¼Œè·Ÿ \(T\) è¿é€šå°±æ˜¯æ¨ªç€çš„ã€‚

  • ä» \(S\) å‘æ¯ä¸ªæ ¼å­è¿è¾¹ï¼Œå®¹é‡ä¸ºå…¶æ¨ªå‘è¿æ¥çš„è¾¹ç•Œ/ç©ºæ ¼ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œå‰²å¼€è¡¨ç¤ºå…¶æ¨ªç€æ”¾ï¼›
  • ä»æ¯ä¸ªæ ¼å­å‘ \(T\) è¿è¾¹ï¼Œå®¹é‡ä¸ºå…¶çºµå‘è¿æ¥çš„è¾¹ç•Œ/ç©ºæ ¼ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œå‰²å¼€è¡¨ç¤ºå…¶ç«–ç€æ”¾ï¼›
  • ç›¸é‚»ä¸¤ä¸ª # ä¹‹é—´è¿åŒå‘å®¹é‡ä¸º \(1\) çš„è¾¹ï¼Œå³å¦‚æœä»–ä»¬æ‘†æ³•ä¸ä¸€æ ·åˆ™ä»˜å‡º \(1\) çš„ä»£ä»·ã€‚

æ±‚æœ€å°å‰²é™¤ä»¥äºŒå³å¯ã€‚

Implementation

TopCoder ä½ ğŸä»€ä¹ˆæ—¶å€™â‘£å•ŠğŸ˜…ã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define il inline
#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = (a); i <= (b); ++i)

using namespace std;

class MaxFlow {
  private:
    static const int maxn = 3005, maxm = 2e5 + 5;
    int head[maxn], cnte;
    struct Edge {
        int to, nxt, w;
    } e[maxm];
    int dep[maxn], cur[maxn];
    bool bfs() {
        static int q[maxn], qh, qt;
        memset(dep, -1, sizeof dep);
        memcpy(cur, head, sizeof head);
        q[qh = qt = 1] = S, dep[S] = 0;
        while (qh <= qt) {
            int u = q[qh++];
            for (int i = head[u]; i; i = e[i].nxt) {
                int &v = e[i].to;
                if (e[i].w && dep[v] == -1) {
                    q[++qt] = v;
                    dep[v] = dep[u] + 1;
                    if (v == T) return true;
                }
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
    int dfs(int u, int in) {
        if (u == T) return in;
        int out = 0;
        for (int i = cur[u]; i; i = e[i].nxt) {
            int &v = e[i].to;
            cur[u] = i;
            if (e[i].w > 0 && dep[v] == dep[u] + 1) {
                int res = dfs(v, min(in, e[i].w));
                e[i].w -= res, e[i ^ 1].w += res;
                in -= res, out += res;
            }
            if (!in) break;
        }
        if (!out) dep[u] = -1;
        return out;
    }
  public:
    int S, T;
    MaxFlow() {
        memset(head, 0, sizeof head);
        cnte = 1;
    }
    il void addEdge(int u, int v, int w) {
        e[++cnte] = {v, head[u], w}, head[u] = cnte;
        e[++cnte] = {u, head[v], 0}, head[v] = cnte;
        return;
    }
    int solve() {
        int ret = 0;
        while (bfs()) ret += dfs(S, 1e9);
        return ret;
    }
} flow;

class BoardPainting {
  private:
    int n, m, id[55][55], tot;
  public:
    int minimalSteps(vector<string> mp) {
        n = mp.size(), m = mp[0].size();
        flow.S = 1, flow.T = tot = 2;
        auto check = [&](const int &x, const int &y) -> int {
            if (x < 0 || x >= n || y < 0 || y >= m) return 1;
            return mp[x][y] != '#';
        };
        FOR(i, 0, n - 1) FOR(j, 0, m - 1) if (mp[i][j] == '#') {
            id[i][j] = ++tot;
            flow.addEdge(flow.S, id[i][j], check(i, j - 1) + check(i, j + 1));
            flow.addEdge(id[i][j], flow.T, check(i - 1, j) + check(i + 1, j));
        }
        FOR(i, 0, n - 1) FOR(j, 0, m - 1) if (mp[i][j] == '#') {
            static const int fx[] = {0, 0, 1, -1};
            static const int fy[] = {1, -1, 0, 0};
            FOR(k, 0, 3) {
                int x = i + fx[k], y = j + fy[k];
                if (!check(x, y)) flow.addEdge(id[i][j], id[x][y], 1);
            }
        }
        return flow.solve() >> 1;
    }
    BoardPainting() {
        memset(id, 0, sizeof id);
        tot = 0;
    }
};

item.title: TopCoder12432 CurvyonRails
item.description:
Description

æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ª \(n\times m\) çš„ç½‘æ ¼ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªæ ¼å­æ˜¯è‰åŸæˆ–è€…åŸé•‡ã€‚è¦åœ¨åŸé•‡ä¿®è‹¥å¹²é¦–å°¾ç›¸æ¥çš„é“è·¯æŠŠæ‰€æœ‰åŸé•‡ä¸²èµ·æ¥ã€‚

æœ‰äº›åŸé•‡é‡Œæœ‰äººï¼Œä»–ä»¬å¸Œæœ›ç©¿è¿‡æ‰€åœ¨åŸé•‡çš„é“è·¯æ˜¯å¼¯çš„ã€‚é—®æœ€å¤šèƒ½æ»¡è¶³å¤šå°‘äººçš„éœ€æ±‚ã€‚æ— è§£è¾“å‡º \(-1\)ã€‚

Solution

ä¸è€ƒè™‘å¼¯æ›²çš„è¯ï¼Œå³è¦æ±‚æ¯ä¸ªç‚¹çš„åº¦æ•°ä¸º \(2\)ï¼Œé‡åˆ°æ£‹ç›˜è€ƒè™‘é»‘ç™½æŸ“è‰²ï¼Œç™½ç‚¹å‘ç›¸é‚»é»‘ç‚¹è¿å®¹é‡ä¸º \(1\) çš„è¾¹ï¼Œ\(S\) å‘ç™½ç‚¹è¿å®¹é‡ä¸º \(2\) çš„è¾¹ï¼Œé»‘ç‚¹å‘ \(T\) è¿å®¹é‡ä¸º \(2\) çš„è¾¹ï¼Œæ»¡æµå³æœ‰è§£ã€‚

ç„¶åè€ƒè™‘å…³é”®ç‚¹çš„è¿™ä¸ªé™åˆ¶ï¼Œå‘ç°å¦‚æœä¸€ä¸ªå…³é”®ç‚¹å¤„ï¼Œä¸¤ä¸ªè¿æ¥æ˜¯ç›¸å¯¹çš„ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°±è¦è´¡çŒ® \(1\) çš„ä»£ä»·ã€‚ä¸å¦¨å°†æ¯ä¸ªç‚¹æ‹†æˆæ¨ªç‚¹å’Œç«–ç‚¹ï¼Œ\(S\) å‘æ¯ä¸ªç™½ç‚¹è¿å®¹é‡ä¸º \(1\) çš„è¾¹ï¼Œæ¨ªç™½å‘ç«–é»‘/ç«–ç™½å‘æ¨ªé»‘è¿å®¹é‡ä¸º \(1\) çš„è¾¹ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªé»‘ç‚¹å†å‘ \(T\) è¿å®¹é‡ä¸º \(1\) çš„è¾¹ï¼Œè¿™æ ·æ‰€æœ‰çš„æ ¼å­ä¸Šé“è½¨éƒ½æ˜¯å¼¯çš„äº†ã€‚

ä½†æ˜¯å¯èƒ½æ— è§£ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åŒä¸€ä¸ªæ ¼å­æ‹†çš„ç‚¹é‡Œé¢è¿å®¹é‡ä¸º \(1\) è´¹ç”¨ä¸º \(1\) çš„è¾¹ã€‚ç„¶åè·‘æœ€å°è´¹ç”¨æœ€å¤§æµå³å¯ã€‚

å…¶å®å¾ˆåƒ TJOI2013 å¾ªç¯æ ¼ï¼Œéƒ½æ˜¯å°†é™åˆ¶è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºå®¹é‡ï¼Œç„¶åç”¨è´¹ç”¨æµæè¿°å…¶ä»£ä»·ã€‚

Implementation

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define il inline
#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = (a); i <= (b); ++i)

using namespace std;

class CurvyonRails {
  private:
    static const int maxn = 2005;
    int n, m, id1[28][28], id2[28][28], tot;
    int S, T, cnt, cnt2;

    struct Edge {
        int to, nxt, w, c;
    } e[50005];
    int head[maxn], cnte;

    il void addEdge(int u, int v, int w, int c) {
        e[++cnte] = {v, head[u], w, c}, head[u] = cnte;
        e[++cnte] = {u, head[v], 0, -c}, head[v] = cnte;
        return;
    }

    int dis[maxn], flow[maxn], maxFlow, minCost;
    int pre[maxn], inq[maxn];

    bool SPFA() {
        memset(dis, 0x3f, sizeof dis);
        memset(inq, 0, sizeof inq);
        queue<int> q;
        q.push(S), inq[S] = 1, dis[S] = 0, flow[S] = 1e9;
        while (!q.empty()) {
            int u = q.front(); q.pop();
            inq[u] = 0;
            for (int i = head[u], v = e[i].to; i; v = e[i = e[i].nxt].to) {
                if (e[i].w > 0 && dis[v] > dis[u] + e[i].c) {
                    dis[v] = dis[u] + e[i].c;
                    flow[v] = min(flow[u], e[i].w);
                    pre[v] = i;
                    if (!inq[v]) q.push(v), inq[v] = 1;
                }
            }
        }
        return dis[T] < 1e9;
    }

    void update() {
        int u = T;
        while (u != S) {
            int i = pre[u];
            e[i].w -= flow[T], e[i ^ 1].w += flow[T];
            u = e[i ^ 1].to;
        }
        maxFlow += flow[T], minCost += flow[T] * dis[T];
        return;
    }

  public:
    CurvyonRails() {
        maxFlow = minCost = 0;
        cnt = cnt2 = tot = 0;
        cnte = 1;
        memset(id1, 0, sizeof id1);
        memset(id2, 0, sizeof id2);
    }
    int getmin(vector<string> field) {
        n = field.size(), m = field[0].size();
        S = 1, T = tot = 2;
        FOR(i, 0, n - 1) FOR(j, 0, m - 1) if (field[i][j] != 'w') {
            id1[i][j] = ++tot;
            id2[i][j] = ++tot;
        }
        FOR(i, 0, n - 1) FOR(j, 0, m - 1) if (id1[i][j]) {
            if ((i + j) & 1) {
                ++cnt2, ++cnt;
                addEdge(id1[i][j], T, 1, 0);
                addEdge(id2[i][j], T, 1, 0);
            } else {
                --cnt2, ++cnt;
                addEdge(S, id1[i][j], 1, 0);
                addEdge(S, id2[i][j], 1, 0);
                FOR(k, 0, 3) {
                    static const int fx[] = {0, 1, 0, -1};
                    static const int fy[] = {1, 0, -1, 0};
                    int x = i + fx[k], y = j + fy[k];
                    if (x < 0 || x >= n || y < 0 || y >= m || field[x][y] == 'w') continue;
                    if (k & 1) addEdge(id1[i][j], id2[x][y], 1, 0);
                    else addEdge(id2[i][j], id1[x][y], 1, 0);
                }
            }
            int cost = (field[i][j] == 'C');
            addEdge(id1[i][j], id2[i][j], 1, cost);
            addEdge(id2[i][j], id1[i][j], 1, cost);
        }
        if (cnt2) return -1;
        while (SPFA()) update();
        if (maxFlow != cnt) return -1;
        return minCost;
    }
};

item.title: P4689 [Ynoi2016] è¿™æ˜¯æˆ‘è‡ªå·±çš„å‘æ˜
item.description:
Description

\(n\) ä¸ªç‚¹çš„æ ‘ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªç‚¹æœ‰ç‚¹æƒ \(a_i\)ï¼Œåˆå§‹æ ¹ä¸º \(1\)ï¼Œ\(m\) æ¬¡æ“ä½œï¼š

  • 1 x å°†æ ‘æ ¹æ¢æˆ \(x\)ï¼›
  • 2 x y ç»™å‡ºä¸¤ä¸ªç‚¹ \(x,y\)ï¼Œé—® \(\sum\limits_{u\in\mathrm{subtree}(x)}\sum\limits_{v\in\mathrm{subtree}(y)}[a_u = a_v]\)ã€‚

\(1\le n\le 10^5;1\le m\le 5\times 10^5,1\le a_i\le 10^9\)ã€‚

Solution

ä¸è€ƒè™‘æ¢æ ¹çš„è¯ï¼Œdfs åºæ‹æ‰ä¹‹åå­æ ‘é—®é¢˜å°±å˜æˆäº†åŒºé—´é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå˜æˆäº† P5268ï¼Œé€šè¿‡å·®åˆ†æ‹†è¯¢é—®çš„æ–¹å¼è«é˜Ÿæ±‚è§£ã€‚

ä½†å…¶å®æ¢æ ¹ä¸å¦å®é™…ä¸Šä¹Ÿä¸é‡è¦ï¼Œå› ä¸ºéƒ½å¯ä»¥åˆ†ä¸º \(3\) ç±»æƒ…å†µè®¨è®ºï¼ˆè€ƒè™‘åŸæ ‘ï¼‰ï¼š

  • è‹¥å½“å‰æ ¹åœ¨ \(x\) å­æ ‘å¤–ï¼Œåˆ™ \(x\) åœ¨æ–°æ ¹ä¸‹çš„å­æ ‘è¿˜æ˜¯åŸæ¥çš„å­æ ‘ï¼›
  • è‹¥å½“å‰æ ¹åœ¨ \(x\) çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå„¿å­ \(y\) çš„å­æ ‘å†…ï¼Œåˆ™ \(x\) åœ¨æ–°æ ¹ä¸‹çš„å­æ ‘å³ä¸ºæ•´æ£µæ ‘æ‰£æ‰ \(y\) å­æ ‘ï¼›
  • è‹¥å½“å‰æ ¹å°±æ˜¯ \(x\)ï¼Œå­æ ‘å³ä¸ºæ•´æ£µæ ‘ã€‚

è¿™ä¸ªä¸œè¥¿å¯ä»¥åˆ©ç”¨æ ‘å‰–é¢„å¤„ç†ä»€ä¹ˆçš„éšç¼˜åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸‹ã€‚

ä½†æ˜¯å¦‚æœç›´æ¥å¥—ï¼Œä¼šå‘ç°å¯¹ä¸Šé¢çš„ case 2ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯¹äºå•ä¸ªè¯¢é—®å¯èƒ½æ‹†å‡ºåå…­ä¸ªè¯¢é—®å‡ºæ¥ï¼Œè¿™æ ·æ˜æ˜¾æ˜¯å¾ˆåŠ£çš„ã€‚

è€ƒè™‘å¯¹ \(f_{[l_1, r_1], [l_2, r_2]}\) è¿™ç§ä¸œè¥¿ä¼˜åŒ–ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œæ³¨æ„åˆ°æˆ‘ä»¬ä¼šæœ‰å½¢å¦‚ \(f_{[l_1, r_1],[1,l_2)\cup (r_2, n]}\) å’Œ \(f_{[1,l_1)\cup (r_1, n],[1,l_2)\cup (r_2, n]}\) çš„è¯¢é—®ä¼šäº§ç”Ÿå¤šæ‹†çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œå°†å…¶å®¹æ–¥ï¼š

  • \(f_{[l_1,r_1],[1,l_2)\cup(r_2, n]} = f_{[l_1, r_1], [1, n]} - f_{[l_1, r_1],[l_2, r_2]}\)ã€‚
  • \(f_{[1,l_1)\cup (r_1, n],[1,l_2)\cup (r_2, n]} = f_{[1,n],[1,n]}-f_{[l_1, r_1],[1,n]} - f_{[1,n],[l_2,r_2]} + f_{[l_1,r_1],[l_2,r_2]}\)ã€‚

è€Œä¸”æ³¨æ„åˆ°ï¼Œå½¢å¦‚ \(f_{[l,r],[1,n]}\) çš„ä¸œè¥¿è¿˜å¯ä»¥æ‹†æˆ \(f_{[1,r],[1,n]} - f_{[1,l),[1,n]}\)ï¼Œè¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªä¸œè¥¿æ˜¾ç„¶å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥é¢„å¤„ç†ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥å°±åªç”¨æ‹†å››ä¸ªè¯¢é—®äº†ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡æœ¬é¢˜ã€‚

å…¶å®è¿˜æœ‰ä¸€ç§æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯å€é•¿ dfs åºï¼Œç„¶å \([1,l)\cup (r,n]\) å°±å¯ä»¥å˜æˆ \((r, l + n)\)ã€‚åªä¸è¿‡çœ‹ç€æ²¡å•¥ç”¨ï¼Œæ²¡å†™ï¼ˆæ ¹å·é‡Œé¢å°‘äº†å››å€å’Œå¤–é¢å¤šä¸¤å€å·®çƒä¸å¤šä¼¼ä¹ï¼‰

Implementation

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <fastio.hpp>
#define il inline
#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = (a); i <= (b); ++i)
#define DEC(i, a, b) for (int i = (a); i >= (b); --i)
#define szof(a) ((int) (a).size())
#define debug(...) fprintf(stderr, __VA_ARGS__)
#define fileIn(s) freopen(s, "r", stdin)
#define fileOut(s) freopen(s, "w", stdout)
#define clr(f, n) memset(f, 0, (sizeof(int)) * (n))
#define cpy(f, g, n) memcpy(f, g, (sizeof(int)) * (n))

using namespace std;

namespace YangTY {

template<typename T> il T max(const T &a, const T &b) {return a > b ? a : b;}
template<typename T> il T min(const T &a, const T &b) {return a < b ? a : b;}
template<typename T, typename...Args> il T max(const T &a, const Args&... args) {
    T res = max(args...);
    return max(a, res);
}
template<typename T, typename...Args> il T min(const T &a, const Args&... args) {
    T res = min(args...);
    return min(a, res);
}
template<typename T> il T chkmax(T &a, const T &b) {return a = (b > a ? b : a);}
template<typename T> il T chkmin(T &a, const T &b) {return a = (b < a ? b : a);}
template<typename T> il T myabs(const T &a) {return a >= 0 ? a : -a;}
template<typename T> il void myswap(T &a, T &b) {
    T t = a;
    a = b, b = t;
    return;
}

using fastIO::is;
using fastIO::os;
using ll = long long;
const int maxn = 1e5 + 5, maxm = 4e6 + 5;
int n, m, a[maxn], b[maxn], block, tot;
vector<int> G[maxn];
int fa[maxn], top[maxn], size[maxn], son[maxn], dfn[maxn], dfnClock, dep[maxn];

void dfs1(int u, int pre) {
    fa[u] = pre, size[u] = 1, dep[u] = dep[pre] + 1;
    for (auto &v : G[u]) if (v != pre) {
        dfs1(v, u);
        size[u] += size[v];
        if (size[v] > size[son[u]]) son[u] = v;
    }
    return;
}

void dfs2(int u, int topf) {
    top[u] = topf, dfn[u] = ++dfnClock;
    if (son[u]) dfs2(son[u], topf);
    for (auto &v : G[u]) if (v != son[u] && v != fa[u]) dfs2(v, v);
}

int getSon(int rt, int x) {
    while (top[rt] != top[x]) {
        if (fa[top[x]] == rt) return top[x];
        x = fa[top[x]];
    }
    return son[rt];
}

il bool isSonOf(int u, int v) {
    return dfn[v] >= dfn[u] && dfn[v] < dfn[u] + size[u];
}

struct Query {
    int p1, p2, sgn, id;
} q[maxm];
ll ans[maxm], cnt1[maxn], cnt2[maxn], pre[maxn];

int main() {
    is >> n >> m;
    FOR(i, 1, n) is >> a[i], b[i] = a[i];
    FOR(i, 2, n) {
        int u, v; is >> u >> v;
        G[u].push_back(v), G[v].push_back(u);
    }
    dfs1(1, 0), dfs2(1, 1);
    sort(a + 1, a + n + 1);
    tot = unique(a + 1, a + n + 1) - a - 1;
    FOR(i, 1, n) b[i] = lower_bound(a + 1, a + tot + 1, b[i]) - a - 1;
    tot = 0;
    FOR(i, 1, n) ++cnt1[a[dfn[i]] = b[i]];
    FOR(i, 1, n) pre[i] = pre[i - 1] + cnt1[a[i]];
    int root = 1;
    auto addQuery = [](int l1, int r1, int l2, int r2, int sgn, int id) {
        q[++tot] = {r1, r2, sgn, id};
        q[++tot] = {r1, l2 - 1, -sgn, id};
        q[++tot] = {l1 - 1, r2, -sgn, id};
        q[++tot] = {l1 - 1, l2 - 1, sgn, id};
        return;
    };
    auto L = [](const int &u) {return dfn[u];};
    auto R = [](const int &u) {return dfn[u] + size[u] - 1;};
    FOR(i, 1, m) {
        int op, x, y;
        is >> op >> x;
        if (op == 1) root = x, ans[i] = -1;
        else {
            ans[i] = 0;
            is >> y;
            int tx = isSonOf(x, root); if (x == root) x = 1, tx = 0;
            int ty = isSonOf(y, root); if (y == root) y = 1, ty = 0;
            if (tx) x = getSon(x, root);
            if (ty) y = getSon(y, root);
            if (tx && ty) ans[i] = pre[n];
            if (tx) ans[i] += (pre[R(y)] - pre[L(y) - 1]) * (tx == ty ? -1 : 1);
            if (ty) ans[i] += (pre[R(x)] - pre[L(x) - 1]) * (tx == ty ? -1 : 1);
            addQuery(L(x), R(x), L(y), R(y), tx == ty ? 1 : -1, i);
        }
    }
    block = n / sqrt(tot) + 1;
    sort(q + 1, q + tot + 1, [](const Query &a, const Query &b) {return ((a.p1 / block) ^ (b.p1 / block)) ? a.p1 < b.p1 : (((a.p1 / block) & 1) ? a.p2 > b.p2 : a.p2 < b.p2);});
    ll tmp = 0; memset(cnt1, 0, sizeof cnt1);
    int p1 = 0, p2 = 0;
    FOR(i, 1, tot) {
        while (p1 < q[i].p1) tmp += cnt2[a[++p1]], ++cnt1[a[p1]];
        while (p1 > q[i].p1) --cnt1[a[p1]], tmp -= cnt2[a[p1--]];
        while (p2 < q[i].p2) tmp += cnt1[a[++p2]], ++cnt2[a[p2]];
        while (p2 > q[i].p2) --cnt2[a[p2]], tmp -= cnt1[a[p2--]];
        ans[q[i].id] += tmp * q[i].sgn;
    }
    FOR(i, 1, m) if (~ans[i]) os << ans[i] << '\n';
    return 0;
}

} // namespace YangTY

int main() {
    YangTY::main();
    return 0;
}

item.title: P3242 [HNOI2015] æ¥æ°´æœ
item.description:
Description

ç»™å®š \(n\) ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æ ‘å’Œå¤§å°ä¸º \(p\) çš„è·¯å¾„è·¯å¾„é›†åˆ \(S\)ï¼Œç¬¬ \(i\) ä¸ªè·¯å¾„çš„æƒå€¼ä¸º \(c_i\)ã€‚\(q\) æ¬¡è¯¢é—®ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡è¯¢é—®ç»™å®šä¸€æ¡è·¯å¾„ï¼Œé—®å…¶è¦†ç›–çš„ \(S\) ä¸­çš„è·¯å¾„ä¸­ï¼Œç¬¬ \(k\) å°çš„æƒå€¼ã€‚æ•°æ®èŒƒå›´ \(40000\)ï¼Œæƒå€¼èŒƒå›´ \(10^9\)ã€‚å…è®¸ç¦»çº¿ã€‚

Solution

è·¯å¾„è¦†ç›–é—®é¢˜è€ƒè™‘ä½¿ç”¨ dfs åºè¿›è¡Œè½¬åŒ–æˆçŸ©å½¢è¦†ç›–é—®é¢˜ã€‚

è®¾ \(l_u,r_u\) åˆ†åˆ«ä¸º \(u\) çš„å…¥åºå’Œå‡ºåºã€‚åˆ™ \(u\) æ˜¯ \(v\) ç¥–å…ˆç­‰ä»·äº \(l_u\le l_v\le r_v\le r_u\)ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥å¯¹äº \((x,y)\)ï¼ˆç›´æ¥é’¦å®š \(l_x<l_y\)ï¼‰ï¼Œä¾æ® \(x\) æ˜¯å¦ä¸º \(y\) ç¥–å…ˆè®¨è®ºï¼š

  • \(x\) ä¸ä¸º \(y\) ç¥–å…ˆï¼Œåˆ™èƒ½è¦†ç›– \((x,y)\) çš„è·¯å¾„ \((u,v)\) ä¸€å®šæ»¡è¶³ \(u\) åœ¨ \(x\) å­æ ‘å†…ä¸” \(v\) åœ¨ \(y\) å­æ ‘å†…ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°±æ˜¯ \(l_x\le l_u\le r_x\land l_y\le l_v\le r_y\)ï¼Œå³ \((l_u,l_v)\) åœ¨çŸ©å½¢ \((l_x, l_y)-(r_x,r_y)\) ä¸­ã€‚
  • \(x\) ä¸º \(y\) ç¥–å…ˆï¼Œä»¤ \(x\) çš„å„¿å­ä¸º \(z\)ï¼Œåˆ™èƒ½è¦†ç›– \((x,y)\) çš„è·¯å¾„ \((u,v)\) ä¸€å®šæ»¡è¶³å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ç«¯åœ¨ \(z\) å­æ ‘å¤–ä¸”å¦ä¸€ç«¯åœ¨ \(y\) å­æ ‘å†…ï¼Œå‰è€…æ»¡è¶³ \(l_u\in[1, l_z - 1]\cup [r_z + 1, n]\)ï¼Œåè€…æ»¡è¶³ \(l_v\in[l_v, r_v]\)ã€‚ä¸ºäº†æ–¹ä¾¿æˆ‘ä»¬ä»¤ \(l_u<l_v\)ï¼Œåˆ™åˆ†è®¨ä¸€ä¸‹å¾—åˆ° \((l_u,l_v)\) åœ¨çŸ©å½¢ \((1,l_v)-(l_z - 1,r_v)\) ä¸ \((l_v, r_z+1)-(r_v, n)\) ä¸­ï¼ˆä¸¤è€…ä¸äº¤ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åˆ†åˆ«è®¡ç®—ï¼‰ã€‚

äºæ˜¯æœ¬é¢˜å³è¢«è½¬åŒ–æˆâ€”â€”æ¯æ¬¡è¯¢é—®ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹ \((l_u,l_v)\)ï¼Œç„¶åé—®è¦†ç›–äº†å…¶çš„çŸ©å½¢ä¸­ï¼Œæƒå€¼ç¬¬ \(k\) å°çš„é‚£ä¸€ä¸ªã€‚

ä½¿ç”¨æ‰«æçº¿æ‰«ä¸€ä¸ªç»´åº¦ï¼Œå°±å˜æˆäº†åŒºé—´åŠ ï¼ŒåŒºé—´åˆ é™¤ï¼Œå•ç‚¹ç¬¬ \(k\) å°ï¼Œå˜æˆäº† K å¤§æ•°æŸ¥è¯¢ çš„å¼±åŒ–ç‰ˆã€‚äºæ˜¯ä¸Šä¸ªæ•´ä½“äºŒåˆ†å°±åšå®Œäº†ï¼Œæ€»æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ \(O(n\log^2n)\)ã€‚

å…·ä½“åœ°ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯¹ç¬¬ä¸€ç»´æ‰«æçº¿ï¼Œç„¶åå°†åŒºé—´æ“ä½œå·®åˆ†æˆå•ç‚¹ä¿®æ”¹ï¼ˆå› ä¸ºæœ€åæŸ¥çš„æ˜¯å•ç‚¹ï¼‰ï¼Œæ•´ä½“äºŒåˆ†çš„æ—¶å€™ä½¿ç”¨æ ‘çŠ¶æ•°ç»„æ¥ç»´æŠ¤å³å¯ã€‚

Implementation

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <fastio.hpp>
#define il inline
#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = (a); i <= (b); ++i)
#define DEC(i, a, b) for (int i = (a); i >= (b); --i)
#define szof(a) ((int) (a).size())
#define debug(...) fprintf(stderr, __VA_ARGS__)
#define fileIn(s) freopen(s, "r", stdin)
#define fileOut(s) freopen(s, "w", stdout)
#define clr(f, n) memset(f, 0, (sizeof(int)) * (n))
#define cpy(f, g, n) memcpy(f, g, (sizeof(int)) * (n))

using namespace std;

namespace YangTY {

template<typename T> il T max(const T &a, const T &b) {return a > b ? a : b;}
template<typename T> il T min(const T &a, const T &b) {return a < b ? a : b;}
template<typename T, typename...Args> il T max(const T &a, const Args&... args) {
    T res = max(args...);
    return max(a, res);
}
template<typename T, typename...Args> il T min(const T &a, const Args&... args) {
    T res = min(args...);
    return min(a, res);
}
template<typename T> il T chkmax(T &a, const T &b) {return a = (b > a ? b : a);}
template<typename T> il T chkmin(T &a, const T &b) {return a = (b < a ? b : a);}
template<typename T> il T myabs(const T &a) {return a >= 0 ? a : -a;}
template<typename T> il void myswap(T &a, T &b) {
    T t = a;
    a = b, b = t;
    return;
}

using fastIO::is;
using fastIO::os;
const int maxn = 4e4 + 5;
int n, p, m, tot;
vector<int> G[maxn];
int fa[maxn], son[maxn], top[maxn], size[maxn], st[maxn], ed[maxn], dep[maxn], dfnClock;
int org[maxn], ans[maxn];

struct Query {
    int type, t, x, y, k, sgn, id; // ç§ç±»ï¼Œæ—¶é—´æˆ³ï¼Œ[x, y]ï¼ŒåŠ  k
} q[maxn * 7], q1[maxn * 7], q2[maxn * 7];

void dfs1(int u, int pre) {
    fa[u] = pre, dep[u] = dep[pre] + 1, size[u] = 1;
    for (auto &v : G[u]) if (v != pre) {
        dfs1(v, u);
        size[u] += size[v];
        if (size[v] > size[son[u]]) son[u] = v;
    }
    return;
}

void dfs2(int u, int topf) {
    top[u] = topf, st[u] = ++dfnClock;
    if (son[u]) dfs2(son[u], topf);
    for (auto &v : G[u]) if (v != son[u] && v != fa[u]) dfs2(v, v);
    ed[u] = dfnClock;
    return;
}

int getLCA(int u, int v) {
    while (top[u] != top[v]) {
        if (dep[top[u]] < dep[top[v]]) swap(u, v);
        u = fa[top[u]];
    }
    return dep[u] < dep[v] ? u : v;
}

int getSon(int rt, int x) {
    while (top[rt] != top[x]) {
        if (fa[top[x]] == rt) return top[x];
        x = fa[top[x]];
    }
    return son[rt];
}

struct BIT {
    int t[maxn];
    #define lowbit(x) (x & -x)
    void add(int x, int c) {
        for (; x <= n; x += lowbit(x)) t[x] += c;
        return;
    }
    void modify(int x, int y, int c) {return add(x, c), add(y + 1, -c);}
    int query(int x) {
        int ret = 0;
        for (; x; x -= lowbit(x)) ret += t[x];
        return ret;
    }
} tree;

void solve(int l, int r, int ql, int qr) {
    if (l > r || ql > qr) return;
    if (l == r) {
        FOR(i, ql, qr) if (q[i].type == 2) ans[q[i].id] = l;
        return;
    }
    int mid = (l + r) >> 1, cnt1 = 0, cnt2 = 0;
    FOR(i, ql, qr) {
        if (q[i].type == 1) {
            if (q[i].k <= mid) {
                tree.modify(q[i].x, q[i].y, q[i].sgn);
                q1[++cnt1] = q[i];
            } else q2[++cnt2] = q[i];
        } else {
            int res = tree.query(q[i].x);
            if (q[i].k <= res) q1[++cnt1] = q[i];
            else {
                q[i].k -= res;
                q2[++cnt2] = q[i];
            }
        }
    }
    FOR(i, 1, cnt1) if (q1[i].type == 1) tree.modify(q1[i].x, q1[i].y, -q1[i].sgn);
    FOR(i, 1, cnt1) q[ql + i - 1] = q1[i];
    FOR(i, 1, cnt2) q[ql + cnt1 + i - 1] = q2[i];
    return solve(l, mid, ql, ql + cnt1 - 1), solve(mid + 1, r, ql + cnt1, qr);
}

int main() {
    is >> n >> p >> m;
    FOR(i, 2, n) {
        int u, v; is >> u >> v;
        G[u].push_back(v), G[v].push_back(u);
    }
    dfs1(1, 0), dfs2(1, 1);
    auto addRectangle = [](int l1, int r1, int l2, int r2, int c) {
        q[++tot] = {1, l1, r1, r2, c, 1, 0};
        q[++tot] = {1, l2 + 1, r1, r2, c, -1, 0};
    };
    FOR(i, 1, p) {
        int x, y; is >> x >> y >> org[i];
        if (st[x] > st[y]) swap(x, y);
        int lca = getLCA(x, y);
        if (lca == x) {
            int z = getSon(x, y);
            if (st[z] > 1) addRectangle(1, st[y], st[z] - 1, ed[y], org[i]);
            if (ed[z] < n) addRectangle(st[y], ed[z] + 1, ed[y], n, org[i]);
        } else addRectangle(st[x], st[y], ed[x], ed[y], org[i]);
    }
    sort(org + 1, org + p + 1);
    int totk = unique(org + 1, org + p + 1) - org - 1;
    FOR(i, 1, tot) q[i].k = lower_bound(org + 1, org + totk + 1, q[i].k) - org;
    FOR(i, 1, m) {
        int x, y, k; is >> x >> y >> k;
        if (st[x] > st[y]) swap(x, y);
        q[++tot] = {2, st[x], st[y], 0, k, 0, i};
    }
    sort(q + 1, q + tot + 1, [](const Query &a, const Query &b) {return a.t == b.t ? a.type < b.type : a.t < b.t;});
    solve(1, p, 1, tot);
    FOR(i, 1, m) os << org[ans[i]] << '\n';
    return 0;
}

} // namespace YangTY

int main() {
    YangTY::main();
    return 0;
}

item.title: P2046 [NOI2010] æµ·æ‹”
item.description:
Description

YT å¸‚æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè§„åˆ’è‰¯å¥½çš„åŸå¸‚ï¼ŒåŸå¸‚è¢«ä¸œè¥¿å‘å’Œå—åŒ—å‘çš„ä¸»å¹²é“åˆ’åˆ†ä¸º \(n \times n\) ä¸ªåŒºåŸŸã€‚ç®€å•èµ·è§ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°† YT å¸‚çœ‹ä½œ ä¸€ä¸ªæ­£æ–¹å½¢ï¼Œæ¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŒºåŸŸä¹Ÿå¯çœ‹ä½œä¸€ä¸ªæ­£æ–¹å½¢ã€‚ä»è€Œï¼ŒYT åŸå¸‚ä¸­åŒ…æ‹¬ \((n+1) \times (n+1)\) ä¸ªäº¤å‰è·¯å£å’Œ \(2n \times (n+1)\) æ¡åŒå‘é“è·¯ï¼ˆç®€ç§°é“è·¯ï¼‰ï¼Œæ¯æ¡åŒå‘é“è·¯è¿æ¥ä¸»å¹²é“ä¸Šä¸¤ä¸ªç›¸é‚»çš„äº¤å‰è·¯å£ã€‚

å° Z ä½œä¸ºè¯¥å¸‚çš„å¸‚é•¿ï¼Œä»–æ ¹æ®ç»Ÿè®¡ä¿¡æ¯å¾—åˆ°äº†æ¯å¤©ä¸Šç­é«˜å³°æœŸé—´ YT å¸‚æ¯æ¡é“è·¯ä¸¤ä¸ªæ–¹å‘çš„äººæµé‡ï¼Œå³åœ¨é«˜å³°æœŸé—´æ²¿ç€è¯¥æ–¹å‘é€šè¿‡è¿™æ¡é“è·¯çš„äººæ•°ã€‚æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªäº¤å‰è·¯å£éƒ½æœ‰ä¸åŒçš„æµ·æ‹”é«˜åº¦å€¼ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¦‚æœä¸€æ®µé“è·¯çš„ç»ˆç‚¹æµ·æ‹”å‡å»èµ·ç‚¹æµ·æ‹”çš„å€¼ä¸º \(h\)ï¼ˆæ³¨æ„ \(h\) å¯èƒ½æ˜¯è´Ÿæ•°ï¼‰ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä¸€ä¸ªäººç»è¿‡è¿™æ®µè·¯æ‰€æ¶ˆè€—çš„ä½“åŠ›æ˜¯ \(\max\{0, h\}\)ã€‚

å° Z è¿˜æµ‹é‡å¾—åˆ°è¿™ä¸ªåŸå¸‚è¥¿åŒ—è§’çš„äº¤å‰è·¯å£æµ·æ‹”ä¸º \(0\)ï¼Œä¸œå—è§’çš„äº¤å‰è·¯å£æµ·æ‹”ä¸º \(1\)ï¼ˆå¦‚ä¸Šå›¾æ‰€ç¤ºï¼‰ï¼Œä½†å…¶å®ƒäº¤å‰è·¯å£çš„æµ·æ‹”é«˜åº¦éƒ½æ— æ³•å¾—çŸ¥ã€‚å° Z æƒ³çŸ¥é“åœ¨æœ€ç†æƒ³çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼ˆå³ä½ å¯ä»¥ä»»æ„å‡è®¾å…¶ä»–è·¯å£çš„æµ·æ‹”é«˜åº¦ï¼‰ï¼Œæ¯å¤©ä¸Šç­é«˜å³°æœŸé—´æ‰€æœ‰äººçˆ¬å¡æ¶ˆè€—çš„æ€»ä½“åŠ›å’Œçš„æœ€å°å€¼ã€‚

\(1\le n\le 500;0\le \text{flow}\le 10^6\)ã€‚

Solution

æµ·æ‹”é«˜åº¦ä¸ä¸€å®šæ˜¯æ•´æ•°æ˜¯è¯ˆéª—æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œé¦–å…ˆå¦‚æœæœ‰å¤§äº \(1\) çš„åˆ™è°ƒæ•´ä¸º \(1\) æ›´ä¼˜ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰å°äº \(0\) çš„è°ƒæ•´ä¸º \(0\) æ›´ä¼˜ã€‚

ç„¶åå‘ç°è¥¿åŒ—è§’ä¸€å®šä¼šå½¢æˆä¸€ä¸ªé«˜åº¦ä¸º \(0\) çš„è¿é€šå—ï¼Œä¸œå—è§’ä¸€å®šä¼šå½¢æˆä¸€ä¸ªé«˜åº¦ä¸º \(1\) çš„è¿é€šå—ï¼Œè¯æ˜å¯ä»¥è§è¿™é‡Œã€‚

äºæ˜¯æ•´ä¸ªé—®é¢˜å˜æˆäº†ä¸€ä¸ªæœ€å°å‰²é—®é¢˜ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ç‚¹å¤ªå¤šäº†ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘ä¼˜åŒ–ã€‚

æ³¨æ„åˆ°è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€å¼ å¹³é¢å›¾ï¼Œå¹³é¢å›¾æœ€å°å‰² = å¯¹å¶å›¾æœ€çŸ­è·¯ã€‚

å¯¹å¶å›¾çš„æ„å»ºå¯ä»¥çœ‹ä½œå¹³é¢å›¾çš„è¾¹é¡ºæ—¶é’ˆè½¬äº† \(90^{\circ}\)ï¼Œä»¥æ­¤æ„é€ å³å¯ã€‚

Implementation

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = (a); i <= (b); ++i)

using namespace std;
const int maxn = 3e5 + 5;
int n;
struct Edge {
    int to, nxt, w;
} e[maxn * 10];
int head[maxn], cnte;
int id[505][505], S, T;

void add(int u, int v, int w) {
    e[++cnte] = {v, head[u], w};
    head[u] = cnte;
    return;
}

int dis[maxn], vis[maxn];

void Dijkstra() {
    memset(dis, 0x3f, sizeof dis);
    dis[S] = 0;
    priority_queue<pair<int, int>, vector<pair<int, int>>, greater<pair<int, int>>> q;
    q.push({0, S});
    while (!q.empty()) {
        int u = q.top().second; q.pop();
        if (vis[u]) continue;
        vis[u] = 1;
        for (int i = head[u]; i; i = e[i].nxt) {
            int &v = e[i].to, &w = e[i].w;
            if (dis[v] > dis[u] + w) {
                dis[v] = dis[u] + w;
                q.push({dis[v], v});
            }
        }
    }
    return;
}

int main() {
    cin >> n; ++n;
    FOR(i, 1, n) FOR(j, 1, n) id[i][j] = (i - 1) * n + j;
    S = n * n + 1, T = S + 1;
    FOR(i, 1, n) FOR(j, 1, n - 1) {
        int w; cin >> w;
        if (i == 1) add(S, id[i][j], w);
        else if (i == n) add(id[i - 1][j], T, w);
        else add(id[i - 1][j], id[i][j], w);
    }
    FOR(i, 1, n - 1) FOR(j, 1, n) {
        int w; cin >> w;
        if (j == 1) add(id[i][j], T, w);
        else if (j == n) add(S, id[i][j - 1], w);
        else add(id[i][j], id[i][j - 1], w);
    }
    FOR(i, 1, n) FOR(j, 1, n - 1) {
        int w; cin >> w;
        if (i == 1) add(id[i][j], S, w);
        else if (i == n) add(T, id[i - 1][j], w);
        else add(id[i][j], id[i - 1][j], w);
    }
    FOR(i, 1, n - 1) FOR(j, 1, n) {
        int w; cin >> w;
        if (j == 1) add(T, id[i][j], w);
        else if (j == n) add(id[i][j - 1], S, w);
        else add(id[i][j - 1], id[i][j], w);
    }
    Dijkstra();
    cout << dis[T] << endl;
    return 0;
}

item.title: CF317C Balance
item.description:
Description

æœ‰ \(n\) ä¸ªæ°´æ¡¶ç¼–å·ä¸º \(1\sim n\)ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªæ°´æ¡¶çš„å®¹é‡ä¸ºæ•´æ•° \(v\)ã€‚æ°´æ¡¶ä¹‹é—´æœ‰ \(e\) æ¡åŒå‘ç®¡é“ï¼ˆå¯èƒ½é‡å¤ï¼‰ï¼Œä¸€æ¬¡æ“ä½œå¯ä»¥ä»ä¸€ä¸ªæ°´æ¡¶é€šè¿‡ç®¡é“è¾“é€ä»»æ„éè´Ÿæ•´æ•°é‡çš„æ°´åˆ°å¦ä¸€ä¸ªæ°´æ¡¶ï¼Œä½†è¦ä¿è¯ä»»æ„æ—¶åˆ»æ°´æ¡¶ä¸­çš„æ°´é‡ä¸è¶…è¿‡å®¹é‡ã€‚ç°ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªåˆå§‹å±€é¢ \(\big<a_i\big>\)ï¼ˆè¡¨ç¤ºç¬¬ \(i\) ä¸ªæ°´æ¡¶çš„æ°´é‡ä¸º \(a_i\) ï¼‰å’Œä¸€ä¸ªç›®æ ‡å±€é¢\(\big<b_i\big>\)ï¼Œé—®æ˜¯å¦å¯ä»¥åœ¨ \(2n^2\) æ¬¡æ“ä½œå†…ä»åˆå§‹å±€é¢åˆ°è¾¾ç›®æ ‡å±€é¢ã€‚å¦‚æœå¯ä»¥è¾“å‡ºæ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¾“å‡º NOã€‚\(1\le n \le300,1\le v \le 10^9,0\le e \le50000\)ï¼Œ\(0\le a_i,b_i\le v\)ã€‚

Solution

é‚£ä¹ˆé¦–å…ˆæ˜ç¡®ï¼Œ\(a_i<b_i\) çš„ç‚¹æ˜¯éœ€è¦åˆ«çš„ç‚¹å¼•å…¥çš„ï¼Œè€Œ \(a_i>b_i\) çš„ç‚¹æ˜¯éœ€è¦ä¾›ç»™ç»™åˆ«çš„ç‚¹çš„ã€‚é¦–å…ˆå¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ªè¿é€šå— \(\sum a_i\ne \sum b_i\) åˆ™ä¸€å®šæ— è§£ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬ä¾¿å¯ä»¥å°†é—®é¢˜æ”¾åœ¨ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘ä¸Šè€ƒè™‘ï¼Œå› ä¸º \(O(n^2)\) çš„æ“ä½œæ¬¡æ•°è¿˜æ˜¯æ¯”è¾ƒæ¾çš„ã€‚

é‚£ä¹ˆæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæœ€æœ´ç´ çš„æ€è·¯å°±æ˜¯æšä¸¾è¿™äº› \(a_i < b_i\) çš„ç‚¹ï¼Œç„¶åè®©åŒä¸€è¿é€šå—å†…çš„ \(a_i > b_i\) ç‚¹å¯¹å…¶è¿›è¡Œä¾›ç»™ï¼Œç”±äºæœ‰ \(v\) çš„é™åˆ¶ï¼Œæœ€å¤šéœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œ \(2(n-1)\) æ¬¡ï¼ˆä¸€æ¬¡ä¸è¡Œå’±å°±ä¸¤æ¬¡ï¼‰ã€‚

ä½†åŒæ—¶æˆ‘ä»¬ä¹Ÿæœ‰æ›´ä¼˜çš„æ€è·¯ï¼šä»å¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹å¼€å§‹ï¼Œè‹¥å…¶æ»¡è¶³ \(a_i < b_i\)ï¼Œåˆ™ä»å…¶é‚»è¿‘èŠ‚ç‚¹â€œå¸è¡€â€ä»¥æ»¡è¶³è‡ªå·±çš„æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œè‹¥é‚»è¿‘èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸å¤Ÿå°±é€’å½’ç»§ç»­å¸ï¼Œç„¶åæ»¡è¶³äº†è¿™ä¸ªå¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„é™åˆ¶åï¼Œåˆ æ‰è¿™ä¸ªå¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚é—®é¢˜ä¾¿å˜æˆäº†è§„æ¨¡ \(-1\) çš„å­é—®é¢˜ï¼ˆå½“ç„¶å‰ææ˜¯æœ‰è§£ï¼‰ï¼Œè€Œä¸€æ¬¡è¿™æ ·çš„è°ƒæ•´æœ€å¤šéœ€è¦ \(n-1\) æ¬¡æ“ä½œï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¿™æ ·åšä¸Šç•Œå°±æ˜¯ \(n^2\) çš„äº†ï¼ˆè€Œä¸”æ„Ÿè§‰æ¯”è¾ƒæ¾ï¼‰ã€‚å¯¹äº \(a_i > b_i\) çš„ç‚¹å°±é€’å½’é‡Šæ”¾å³å¯ï¼Œæ€è·¯ç±»ä¼¼ã€‚

ä»£ç ç»†èŠ‚ç¨å¾®æœ‰ä¸€ç‚¹å°å¤šï¼Œéœ€è¦å¥½å¥½å®ç°ä¸€ä¸‹ã€‚

Implementation

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = (a); i <= (b); ++i)
#define debug(...) fprintf(stderr, __VA_ARGS__)

using namespace std;
const int maxn = 305;
int n, V, m, a[maxn], b[maxn];
vector<int> G[maxn], T[maxn];
int vis[maxn], deg[maxn];
long long suma, sumb;
queue<int> q;

struct Op {
    int x, y, d;
    Op(int _x = 0, int _y = 0, int _d = 0) : x(_x), y(_y), d(_d) {}
};
vector<Op> ans;

void dfs0(int u) {
    vis[u] = 1;
    suma += a[u], sumb += b[u];
    for (auto &v : G[u]) if (!vis[v]) {
        T[u].push_back(v), T[v].push_back(u);
        ++deg[u], ++deg[v];
        dfs0(v);
    }
    if (deg[u] == 1) q.push(u);
    return;
}

int dfs1(int u, int fa, int in) { // è¿”å›æ¶ˆåŒ–äº†çš„æµé‡
    int ta = a[u] + in, orga = a[u], out = 0;
    if (ta >= 0 && ta <= V) {
        a[u] = ta;
        if (in >= 0) ans.push_back(Op(fa, u, in));
        else ans.push_back(Op(u, fa, -in));
        return in;
    } else if (ta < 0) { // in < 0 fa å¸è¡€ u
        for (auto &v : T[u]) if (v != fa && vis[v] != 2) {
            int cur = dfs1(v, u, ta);
            ta -= cur, out += cur;
            if (ta >= 0) break;
        }
        a[u] = max(0, ta);
        ans.push_back(Op(u, fa, orga - a[u] - out));
        return a[u] - orga + out;
    } else if (ta > V) {
        for (auto &v : T[u]) if (v != fa && vis[v] != 2) {
            int cur = dfs1(v, u, ta - V);
            ta -= cur, out += cur;
            if (ta <= V) break;
        }
        a[u] = min(V, ta);
        ans.push_back(Op(fa, u, a[u] - orga + out));
        return a[u] - orga + out;
    }
    return 0;
}

int main() {
    cin >> n >> V >> m;
    FOR(i, 1, n) cin >> a[i];
    FOR(i, 1, n) cin >> b[i];
    FOR(i, 1, m) {
        int u, v;
        cin >> u >> v;
        G[u].push_back(v), G[v].push_back(u);
    }
    FOR(i, 1, n) if (!vis[i]) {
        suma = sumb = 0;
        dfs0(i);
        if (suma != sumb) return puts("NO"), 0;
        while (!q.empty()) {
            int u = q.front(); q.pop();
            int v = -1;
            for (auto &vv : T[u]) if (vis[vv] != 2) {
                v = vv;
                break;
            }
            if (v == -1) continue;
            dfs1(v, u, a[u] - b[u]);
            a[u] = b[u];
            vis[u] = 2;
            if (--deg[v] == 1) q.push(v);
        }
    }
    cout << ans.size() << endl;
    for (auto &o : ans) cout << o.x << ' ' << o.y << ' ' << o.d << '\n';
    return 0;
}

item.title: P3557 [POI2013]GRA-Tower Defense Game
item.description:
Description

æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ª \(n\) ä¸ªç‚¹ \(m\) æ¡è¾¹çš„å›¾ï¼Œæ¯æ¡è¾¹è·ç¦»æ˜¯ \(1\)ï¼Œå·²çŸ¥ç”¨ \(k\) ä¸ªæ”»å‡»è·ç¦»ä¸º \(1\) çš„å¡”å¯ä»¥æ‰“åˆ°æ•´ä¸ªåœ°å›¾ï¼Œè®©æ„é€ ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ¡ˆä½¿å¾—ç”¨å°äºç­‰äº \(k\) ä¸ªæ”»å‡»è·ç¦»ä¸º \(2\) çš„å¡”æ‰“åˆ°æ•´ä¸ªåœ°å›¾ã€‚

\(2\le n\le 5\times 10^5\)ï¼Œ\(0\le m\le 10^6\)ï¼Œ\(1\le k\le n\)ã€‚

Solution

ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ä¹Œé±¼å­ä¹±ææ„é€ ç‰›é€¼é¢˜ã€‚

ä¾æ¬¡é€‰æ‹©æœªè¢«è¦†ç›–çš„ç‚¹å¼€å§‹è¦†ç›–å³å¯ã€‚

è¯æ˜ï¼šè€ƒè™‘æ”»å‡»è·ç¦»æ˜¯ \(1\) çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªç‚¹éƒ½è‡³å°‘ä¸ä¸€ä¸ªæ”»å‡»å¡”ç›¸è¿ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆæ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘ä»¬çš„é€‰æ³•ä¸€å®šèƒ½è¦†ç›–è¿™ \(k\) ä¸ªé€‰äº†çš„å¡”ã€‚

Implementation

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = (a); i <= (b); ++i)

using namespace std;
const int maxn = 5e5 + 5;
int vis[maxn], n, m, k;
vector<int> G[maxn], ans;

void dfs(int u, int fa, int dep) {
    vis[u] = 1;
    if (dep >= 2) return;
    for (auto &v : G[u]) if (v != fa) dfs(v, u, dep + 1);
    return;
}

int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin >> n >> m >> k;
    FOR(i, 1, m) {
        int u, v; cin >> u >> v;
        G[u].push_back(v), G[v].push_back(u);
    }
    FOR(i, 1, n) if (!vis[i]) {
        dfs(i, 0, 0);
        ans.push_back(i);
    }
    cout << ans.size() << endl;
    for (auto &x : ans) cout << x << ' ';
    return 0;
}

item.title: AGC002D - Stamp Rally
item.description:
Description

ç»™å®šä¸€å¼  \(n\) ç‚¹ \(m\) è¾¹çš„æ— å‘å›¾ï¼Œ\(q\) æ¬¡è¯¢é—®ä» \(x\) å’Œ \(y\) å‡ºå‘ï¼Œä¸€å…±ç»è¿‡ \(z\) ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼ˆé‡å¤ç»è¿‡çš„åªè®¡ç®—ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼‰ï¼Œç»è¿‡çš„è¾¹çš„æœ€å¤§ç¼–å·çš„æœ€å°å€¼ã€‚

\(n,m,q\le 10^5\)ã€‚

Solution 1

ä¸å¦¨æ€è€ƒå¯¹äºå•æ¬¡è¯¢é—®æˆ‘ä»¬æ€ä¹ˆåšï¼Œâ€œæœ€å°çš„æœ€å¤§â€æç¤ºæˆ‘ä»¬äºŒåˆ†ç„¶åå°†å…¶è½¬ä¸ºåˆ¤å®šé—®é¢˜ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬å¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ª \(mid\) å°±å°†æ‰€æœ‰è¾¹æƒ \(\le mid\) çš„è¾¹ç”¨å¹¶æŸ¥é›†è¿é€šï¼Œç„¶ååˆ¤æ–­ \(x\) å’Œ \(y\) æ‰€åœ¨çš„è¿é€šå—å¤§å°æ˜¯å¦ \(\ge z\)ï¼ˆå¯èƒ½è¦åˆ†ç±»è®¨è®ºä¸€ä¸‹ï¼‰ï¼Œå³å¯ã€‚

è€Œæ•´ä¸ªé—®é¢˜åˆæ˜¯ç¦»çº¿çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç›´æ¥æ•´ä½“äºŒåˆ†å³å¯ã€‚æ³¨æ„ä½¿ç”¨å¯æ’¤é”€å¹¶æŸ¥é›†ã€‚

æ³¨æ„äºŒåˆ†çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œå¯¹äº \(ql > qr\) çš„ case ä¸è¦è¿”å›ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè¦é€’å½’ä¸‹å»æŠŠå¯¹åº”åŒºé—´çš„è¾¹åŠ è¿›è¿é€šå—ï¼Œæ‰èƒ½ä¿è¯ç­”æ¡ˆæ˜¯æ­£ç¡®çš„ã€‚

Implementation 1

using fastIO::is;
using fastIO::os;
const int maxn = 1e5 + 5;
int n, m, Q, ans[maxn];
struct Edge {
    int x, y;
} e[maxn];

struct UnionFind {
    int fa[maxn], sz[maxn], stk[maxn], top;
    void init() {
        FOR(i, 1, n) fa[i] = i, sz[i] = 1;
        top = 0;
        return;
    }
    int find(int x) {return x == fa[x] ? x : find(fa[x]);}
    il bool merge(int x, int y) {
        x = find(x), y = find(y);
        if (x == y) return 0;
        if (sz[x] > sz[y]) swap(x, y);
        fa[x] = y, sz[y] += sz[x];
        stk[++top] = x;
        return 1;
    }
    il int query(int x, int y) {
        x = find(x), y = find(y);
        return x == y ? sz[x] : sz[x] + sz[y];
    }
    il void undo() {
        int x = stk[top--];
        sz[fa[x]] -= sz[x], fa[x] = x;
        return;
    }
} uf;

struct Query {
    int id, x, y, z;
} q[maxn], q1[maxn], q2[maxn];

void solve(int l, int r, int ql, int qr) {
    if (l == r) {
        FOR(i, ql, qr) ans[q[i].id] = l;
        uf.merge(e[l].x, e[l].y);
        return;
    }
    int cnt1 = 0, cnt2 = 0, mid = (l + r) >> 1, nowtop = uf.top;
    FOR(i, l, mid) uf.merge(e[i].x, e[i].y);
    FOR(i, ql, qr) {
        int res = uf.query(q[i].x, q[i].y);
        if (q[i].z <= res) q1[++cnt1] = q[i];
        else q2[++cnt2] = q[i];
    }
    while (uf.top > nowtop) uf.undo();
    FOR(i, 1, cnt1) q[ql + i - 1] = q1[i];
    FOR(i, 1, cnt2) q[ql + cnt1 + i - 1] = q2[i];
    solve(l, mid, ql, ql + cnt1 - 1);
    solve(mid + 1, r, ql + cnt1, qr);
    return;
}

int main() {
    is >> n >> m;
    FOR(i, 1, m)
        is >> e[i].x >> e[i].y;
    uf.init();
    is >> Q;
    FOR(i, 1, Q) {
        int x, y, z; is >> x >> y >> z;
        q[i] = {i, x, y, z};
    }
    solve(1, m, 1, Q);
    FOR(i, 1, Q) os << ans[i] << '\n';
    return 0;
}

Solution 2

å¯¹äºæ­¤ç±»æœ€å°ç“¶é¢ˆé—®é¢˜ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘ä½¿ç”¨ Kruskal é‡æ„æ ‘ã€‚

äºŒåˆ†ç­”æ¡ˆç„¶åå¯¹ \(x\) å’Œ \(y\) å€å¢ä¸Šè·³ï¼Œç»´æŠ¤å­æ ‘å†…å¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ä¸ªæ•°å³å¯ã€‚

ä»£ç å°±ä¸å†™äº†ã€‚

item.title: P3211 [HNOI2011]XORå’Œè·¯å¾„
item.description:
Description

è¾¹å¸¦æƒ \(n\le 100\) æ— å‘å›¾ï¼Œä» \(1\) å¼€å§‹éšæœºæ¸¸èµ°ï¼Œé—®èµ°åˆ° \(n\) çš„è·¯å¾„çš„ xor å’Œçš„æœŸæœ›ï¼Œæœ‰è‡ªç¯é‡è¾¹ã€‚

Solution

æ ¹æ®æœŸæœ›çš„çº¿æ€§æ€§ï¼Œç„¶ååˆæœ‰ä¸ªå¼‚æˆ–ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¯ä»¥æ‹†ä½åšã€‚

ç„¶åç°åœ¨å‡è®¾è€ƒè™‘ç¬¬ \(k\) ä½ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°±ç¼–ä¸€ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€ï¼š\(f_{i, 0/1}\) è¡¨ç¤ºåˆ°è¾¾ç‚¹ \(i\) æ—¶è¿™ä¸€ä½æœ‰/æ— è´¡çŒ®çš„æœŸæœ›ç»è¿‡æ¬¡æ•°ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆæœ‰è½¬ç§»ï¼š \[ f_{u, j} = \sum_{(u,v)\in E}\frac{1}{d_v}f_{v, w(u,v) - j} \] \(f_{1, 0}\) çš„æœ€ååŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå¸¸æ•°é¡¹ \(1\) å› ä¸ºä¸€å¼€å§‹å°±åœ¨ \(1\)ã€‚

é‚£ä¹ˆ \(\sum 2^k f_{n, 1}\) å³ä¸ºç­”æ¡ˆã€‚

Implementation

éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„ï¼Œ\(n\) ä¸èƒ½å¾€åˆ«çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹è´¡çŒ®ï¼Œå»ºçŸ©é˜µçš„æ—¶å€™éœ€è¦åˆ¤å®šå¥½ã€‚

ä»¥åŠï¼Œè‡ªç¯å¯¹åº¦æ•°çš„è´¡çŒ®æ˜¯ \(1\)ï¼ˆè™½ç„¶æˆ‘ä¹Ÿä¸çŸ¥é“ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆï¼Œå¯ä»¥å‚è€ƒæ ·ä¾‹ï¼‰ï¼Œä¹Ÿè¦ç‰¹åˆ¤ã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = (a); i <= (b); ++i)

using namespace std;
using db = long double;
const int maxn = 105;
int n, m, deg[maxn];
vector<pair<int, int>> G[maxn];
db a[maxn << 1][maxn << 1];

void gauss(int n) {
    FOR(i, 1, n) {
        int r = i;
        FOR(j, i, n) if (fabs(a[j][i]) > fabs(a[r][i])) r = j;
        swap(a[r], a[i]);
        FOR(j, 1, n) if (i != j) {
            db div = a[j][i] / a[i][i];
            FOR(k, i + 1, n + 1) a[j][k] -= div * a[i][k];
        }
    }
    FOR(i, 1, n) a[i][n + 1] /= a[i][i];
    return;
}

void build(int k) {
    memset(a, 0, sizeof a);
    static auto f = [](int i, int j) {return i + j * n;};
    FOR(i, 1, n) FOR(j, 0, 1) {
        a[f(i, j)][f(i, j)] = -1;
        for (auto &e : G[i]) if (e.first != n) {
            int c = (e.second >> k) & 1;
            a[f(i, j)][f(e.first, j ^ c)] += 1.0 / deg[e.first];
        }
    }
    a[f(1, 0)][n << 1 | 1] = -1;
    return;
}

int main() {
    cin >> n >> m;
    FOR(i, 1, m) {
        int u, v, w; cin >> u >> v >> w;
        if (u == v && u == n) continue;
        else if (u == v) G[u].push_back({u, w}), ++deg[u];
        else ++deg[u], ++deg[v], G[u].push_back({v, w}), G[v].push_back({u, w});
    }
    db ans = 0;
    FOR(k, 0, 30) {
        build(k);
        gauss(n << 1);
        ans += (1 << k) * a[n << 1][n << 1 | 1];
    }
    cout << fixed << setprecision(3) << ans << endl;
    return 0;
}

item.title: CF113D Museum
item.description:
Description

\(n\le 22\) ä¸ªç‚¹çš„æ— å‘å›¾ï¼Œä¸¤äººåˆå§‹åˆ†åˆ«ä½äºç‚¹ \(a\) å’Œ \(b\)ã€‚ä¸¤äººéšæœºæ¸¸èµ°ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªå•ä½æ—¶é—´ï¼Œåœ¨æ¯ä¸ªç‚¹å¤„æœ‰ \(p_i\) çš„æ¦‚ç‡åœç•™ï¼Œæœ‰ \(1 - p_i\) çš„æ¦‚ç‡éšæœºå‰å¾€ç›¸é‚»ç‚¹ã€‚ä¸¤è€…åœ¨åŒä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹ç›¸é‡æ—¶ç»“æŸã€‚

å¯¹æ¯ä¸ªç‚¹è¯¢é—®å…¶åœåœ¨å¯¹åº”æˆ¿é—´çš„æ¦‚ç‡ã€‚

Solution

å›é¡¾å½“åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªäººçš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæ±‚åœåœ¨æ¯ä¸ªç‚¹çš„æ¦‚ç‡ç›¸å½“äºæ˜¯æ±‚æ¯ä¸ªç‚¹çš„æœŸæœ›æ¬¡æ•°ã€‚

å›åˆ°æœ¬é¢˜ï¼Œç”±äºç‚¹æ•°å¾ˆå°ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¯ä»¥è€ƒè™‘å°†ä¸¤ä¸ªäººçš„çŠ¶æ€åŒæ—¶è€ƒè™‘è¿›å»ï¼Œè®¾ \(f_{i,j}\) è¡¨ç¤ºä¸¤äººåˆ†åˆ«ä½äº \((i, j)\) çŠ¶æ€çš„æœŸæœ›ç»è¿‡æ¬¡æ•°ã€‚åˆ™ç”±äº \((i, i)\) è‡³å¤šç»è¿‡ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ \(f_{i,i}\) å³ä¸ºç­”æ¡ˆã€‚

å¯ä»¥å†™å‡ºè½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼š \[ f_{i,j} = \sum_{(i,a)\in E}\sum_{(j,b)\in E} \frac{(1 - p_a)}{d_a}\frac{(1 - p_b)}{d_b}f_{a,b} + \sum_{(i,a)\in E}\frac{1-p_a}{d_a}p_jf_{a,j} + \sum_{(j,b)\in E} \frac{1-p_b}{d_b}p_if_{i,b} + p_ip_jf_{i,j} \] å¯¹äºåˆå§‹çš„ \(f_{a,b}\) è¿˜éœ€è¦åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå¸¸æ•° \(1\)ã€‚

äºæ˜¯ç›´æ¥é«˜æ–¯æ¶ˆå…ƒå³å¯ï¼Œæ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ \(O(n^6)\)ã€‚

Implementation

åœ¨å¤„ç†è½¬ç§»çš„æ—¶å€™ä¸€å®šè¦æ³¨æ„ç»†èŠ‚ã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = (a); i <= (b); ++i)

using namespace std;
using db = long double;
db p[25], f[505][505];
int deg[25], G[25][25], n, m, sa, sb;

inline int encode(int i, int j) {return (i - 1) * n + j;}

int main() {
    cin >> n >> m >> sa >> sb;
    FOR(i, 1, m) {
        int u, v; cin >> u >> v;
        ++deg[u], ++deg[v], G[u][v] = G[v][u] = 1;
    }
    FOR(i, 1, n) cin >> p[i];
    FOR(i, 1, n) {
        FOR(j, 1, n) {
            f[encode(i, j)][encode(i, j)] = -1;
            if (i != j) f[encode(i, j)][encode(i, j)] += p[i] * p[j];
            FOR(a, 1, n) if (G[a][i]) {
                FOR(b, 1, n) if (G[b][j] && a != b) {
                    f[encode(i, j)][encode(a, b)] += (1 - p[a]) * (1 - p[b]) / deg[a] / deg[b];
                }
            }
            FOR(a, 1, n) if (a != j && G[a][i]) f[encode(i, j)][encode(a, j)] += (1 - p[a]) / deg[a] * p[j];
            FOR(b, 1, n) if (b != i && G[b][j]) f[encode(i, j)][encode(i, b)] += (1 - p[b]) / deg[b] * p[i];
        }
    }
    int tot = encode(n, n);
    f[encode(sa, sb)][tot + 1] = -1;
    FOR(i, 1, tot) { 
        int r = i;
        FOR(j, i + 1, tot) if (fabs(f[j][i]) > fabs(f[r][i])) r = j;
        swap(f[i], f[r]);
        FOR(j, 1, tot) if (j != i) {
            db div = f[j][i] / f[i][i];
            FOR(k, i + 1, tot + 1) f[j][k] -= div * f[i][k];
        }
    }
    cout << fixed << setprecision(12);
    FOR(i, 1, n) cout << f[encode(i, i)][tot + 1] / f[encode(i, i)][encode(i, i)] << ' ';
    return 0;
}

item.title: QOJ2812 [RMI 2021 Day 2] Paths
item.description:
Description

ç»™å®š \(n\le 10^5\) ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æ— æ ¹è¾¹å¸¦æƒæ ‘ã€‚å¯¹äºæ ¹åœ¨ \(r\) çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€‰æ‹© \(k\) ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼ˆ\(k\) åˆå§‹ç»™å®šï¼‰ï¼Œç„¶åå°†æ¯ä¸ªç‚¹åˆ° \(r\) çš„è·¯å¾„ä¸Šçš„è¾¹æ‰“ä¸Šæ ‡è®°ï¼Œæ”¶ç›Šä¸ºæ‰€æœ‰å¸¦æ ‡è®°çš„è¾¹æƒå’Œã€‚

å¯¹æ¯ä¸ª \(r\in[1,n]\) æ±‚å‡ºç­”æ¡ˆã€‚

Solution

é¦–å…ˆæœ€æ˜¾ç„¶çš„è´ªå¿ƒç­–ç•¥å¾ˆå¥½æƒ³ï¼š

  • é€‰æ‹©è´¡çŒ®æœ€å¤§çš„å¶å­ \(u\) å¹¶ç»Ÿè®¡è´¡çŒ®ã€‚
  • å°†æ ¹åˆ° \(u\) çš„è·¯å¾„ä¸Šçš„ç‚¹æ‰“ä¸Šæ ‡è®°ï¼Œæ›´æ–°é‚£äº›å­æ ‘å†…çš„ç‚¹çš„è´¡çŒ®ã€‚
  • å›åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥ã€‚

ç„¶åä¼šå‘ç°â€œåŠ¨æ€æ›´æ–°â€è¿™ä¸ªæœ‰ç‚¹éš¾æï¼Œä¸å¦¨å…ˆè€ƒè™‘ \(r = 1\) çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œç„¶åå‘ç°ä¸€ä¸ªå¶å­çš„è´¡çŒ®ä¸€å®šæ˜¯ä»–åˆ°æŸä¸ªç¥–å…ˆçš„ä¸€æ¡é“¾ã€‚

è‹¥æˆ‘ä»¬è®¾ \(\mathrm{down}_i\) ä¸º \(i\) å­æ ‘å†…è· \(i\) æœ€è¿œçš„ç‚¹ï¼Œ\(a_x\) æ˜¯æ»¡è¶³ \(\mathrm{down}_v\ne x\) çš„æœ€æ·±çš„ç¥–å…ˆï¼ˆè‹¥ä¸å­˜åœ¨åˆ™ä¸º \(1\)ï¼‰åˆ™å¶å­ \(x\) çš„è´¡çŒ®ä¸º \(a_x\) åˆ° \(x\) çš„è·¯å¾„ã€‚

é‚£ä¹ˆå¯¹äº \(r\) å›ºå®šçš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°±æœ‰äº† \(O(n)\)ï¼ˆä¹Ÿè®¸å§ï¼‰åšæ³•ï¼Œç°åœ¨è€ƒè™‘ \(r\) å˜åŠ¨çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œæ¢æ ¹ã€‚

å†ç»´æŠ¤ \(\mathrm{up}_i\) è¡¨ç¤º \(i\) å­æ ‘å¤–è· \(i\) æœ€è¿œçš„ç‚¹ã€‚è€ƒè™‘å½“ \(r\) ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°è‡ªå·±çš„å„¿å­ \(q\) æ—¶ï¼Œå‘ç”Ÿçš„å˜åŒ–ï¼šæ‰‹ç©å‘ç°æ‰€æœ‰çš„ \(a\) ä¸­ï¼Œåªæœ‰ \(a_{\mathrm{up}_q}\) å’Œ \(a_{\mathrm{down}_q}\) ä¼šä» \(r\) å˜æˆ \(q\)ï¼Œå…¶ä»–çš„å‡æ˜¯ä¸å˜çš„ã€‚

äºæ˜¯å…ˆä»¥ \(1\) ä¸ºæ ¹è·‘ä¸€é dfs é¢„å¤„ç†ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œç„¶åå† dfs æšä¸¾ \(r\) æ¢æ ¹ï¼Œç»´æŠ¤æ”¯æŒå•ç‚¹ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œå‰ \(k\) å¤§æŸ¥è¯¢çš„å¯é‡é›†å³å¯ã€‚

è€ƒåœºä¸Šè´ªå¿ƒç­–ç•¥é©¬ä¸Šå°±æƒ³åˆ°äº†ï¼Œå¯æƒœè¢«é™åˆ¶äº†æ€ç»´æ²¡æœ‰å¾€ç§»åŠ¨æ¢æ ¹çš„æ–¹å‘æƒ³ã€‚è¿˜æ˜¯èœã€‚

Implementation

item.title: QOJ1825 [NAC2021 I] The King's Guards
item.description:
Description

\(n\) ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼Œ\(m\) æ¡å¾…ä¿®å»ºçš„è¾¹ \((u_i, v_i, w_i)\)ã€‚\(k\) ä¸ªå®ˆå«ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªå®ˆå«è¿›é©»ä¸€ä¸ªæ‘å­ï¼Œç¬¬ \(i\) ä¸ªèƒ½è¿›é©»çš„é›†åˆä¸º \(S_i\)ã€‚è¦æ±‚æ¯ä¸ªç‚¹éƒ½èƒ½æ°å¥½è¢«ä¸€ä¸ªå®ˆå«é€šè¿‡è‹¥å¹²æ¡è¾¹åˆ°è¾¾ã€‚

è‹¥å­˜åœ¨ä¿®å»ºè¾¹å’Œæ”¾ç½®å®ˆå«çš„æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œè¾“å‡ºå»ºè¾¹çš„æœ€å°ä»£ä»·ï¼Œå¦åˆ™æŠ¥å‘Šæ— è§£ã€‚\(1\le k\le n\le 300\)ï¼Œ\(1\le w_i\le 100\)ã€‚

Solution

æ‹Ÿé˜µè´ªå¿ƒå±å®æœ‰ç‚¹ç¥ä»™äº†ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œå†™å†™æ¸…æ–°è´¹ç”¨æµåšæ³•ã€‚

å¯¹äºè¿™ç§ç±»å‹çš„é¢˜ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æƒ³åˆ°ç­”æ¡ˆä¸€å®šä¼šåœ¨æœ€å°ç”Ÿæˆæ£®æ—ä¸Šé¢äº§ç”Ÿï¼Œå¦åˆ™æ€»å¯ä»¥åˆ æ‰é‚£æ¡ä¸åœ¨æœ€å°ç”Ÿæˆæ£®æ—ä¸Šçš„è¾¹æ¥è·å–ä¸€ä¸ªä¸æ›´åŠ£çš„ç»“æœã€‚æ‰€ä»¥å…ˆæ±‚å‡ºå…¶æœ€å°ç”Ÿæˆæ£®æ—ã€‚

é‚£ä¹ˆé—®é¢˜å°±å˜æˆäº†æ ‘ä¸Šçš„äº†ã€‚

è€Œæ³¨æ„åˆ°ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åˆ†é…å®ˆå«è¿™ä¸ªäº‹æƒ…å¯ä»¥çœ‹ä½œå°†å®ˆå«åŒ¹é…ç»™è¿é€šå—ã€‚è€Œä¸€ä¸ªè¿é€šå—è‚¯å®šæ˜¯ä¸€æ£µæ ‘ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä¸å¦¨è®¤ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªå®ˆå«å¯ä»¥å¹²ç¢å…¶å¯¹åº”è¿é€šå—é‡Œé¢çš„æŸæ¡è¾¹ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆå°±å¯ä»¥è€ƒè™‘è´¹ç”¨æµäº†ã€‚

  • æ‹†æ¯ä¸ªåŸå›¾çš„ç‚¹ä¸ºå…¥ç‚¹å’Œå‡ºç‚¹ï¼Œè¿è¾¹ \((u_{\mathrm{in}},u_{\mathrm{out}}, 1, 0)\)ã€‚

  • å¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ªç”Ÿæˆæ£®æ—ä¸­çš„è¾¹ \((\mathrm{fa}_u, u, w)\) è¿è¾¹ \((u_{\mathrm{out}}, T, 1, w)\) å’Œ \((u_{\mathrm{out}},{\mathrm{fa}_u}_{\mathrm{in}}, 1, 0)\)ã€‚

    ç‰¹åˆ«çš„ï¼Œå¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ªç”Ÿæˆæ£®æ—çš„æ ¹ï¼Œè¿è¾¹ \((u_{\mathrm{out}}, T, 1, +\inf)\)ã€‚

  • å¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ªå®ˆå« \(i\)ï¼Œè¿è¾¹ \((S, i, 1, 0)\)ã€‚

  • å¯¹äºå®ˆå« \(i\) å®ˆå«çš„ç‚¹ \(u\)ï¼Œè¿è¾¹ \((i, u_{\mathrm{in}}, 1, 0)\)ã€‚

å³ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªå®ˆå«å¯¹åº”ä¸€ä¸ªæµï¼Œæ¯æ£µç”Ÿæˆæ ‘çš„æ ¹çš„å®ˆå«äº§ç”Ÿçš„è´¡çŒ®å•ç‹¬å¤„ç†ï¼ˆå³ \(\inf\) è¾¹ï¼‰ï¼Œå‰©ä¸‹çš„å®ˆå«è€ƒè™‘å¹²ç¢ä¸€æ¡è‡ªå·±æ‰€åœ¨è¿é€šå—è¿å‘ç¥–å…ˆçš„è¾¹ï¼ˆå³æ–­è¾¹ï¼‰ã€‚å¯¹ä¸Šé¢è¿™ä¸ªå›¾è·‘æœ€å¤§è´¹ç”¨æµå³å¯ã€‚

å¯¹äºæ— è§£çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­æœ€å¤§æµæ˜¯å¦ä¸º \(k\) ä»¥åŠ \(\inf\) è¾¹æ˜¯å¦æ»¡æµå³å¯ã€‚

Implementation

using ll = long long;
const int maxn = 1505, maxm = 3e5 + 5;
int S, T;

class MCMF {
  private:
    int head[maxn], cur[maxn], cnte = 1;
    struct Edge {
        int to, nxt, w;
        ll cost;
    } e[maxm];
    ll dis[maxn], maxCost;
    int pre[maxn], inq[maxn], flow[maxn], maxFlow;

    bool SPFA() {
        memset(dis, 0x80, sizeof dis);
        memset(inq, 0, sizeof inq);
        queue<int> q;
        q.push(S);
        inq[S] = 1, dis[S] = 0, flow[S] = numeric_limits<int>::max();
        while (!q.empty()) {
            int u = q.front(); q.pop();
            inq[u] = 0;
            for (int i = head[u]; i; i = e[i].nxt) {
                int &v = e[i].to;
                if (e[i].w && dis[v] < dis[u] + e[i].cost) {
                    dis[v] = dis[u] + e[i].cost;
                    flow[v] = min(flow[u], e[i].w);
                    pre[v] = i;
                    if (!inq[v]) q.push(v), inq[v] = 1;
                }
            }
        }
        return dis[T] > static_cast<int>(0x80808080);
    }

    void update() {
        int u = T;
        while (u != S) {
            int i = pre[u];
            e[i].w -= flow[T], e[i ^ 1].w += flow[T];
            u = e[i ^ 1].to;
        }
        maxCost += flow[T] * dis[T];
        maxFlow += flow[T];
        return;
    }
  public:
    il void addEdge(int u, int v, int w, int c) {
        e[++cnte] = {v, head[u], w, c}, head[u] = cnte;
        e[++cnte] = {u, head[v], 0, -c}, head[v] = cnte;
        return;
    }

    pair<int, ll> work() {
        while (SPFA()) update();
        return {maxFlow, maxCost};
    }

} flow;

class UnionFind {
  private:
    int fa[maxn];
    int find(int u) {return u == fa[u] ? u : fa[u] = find(fa[u]);}
  public:
    il bool query(int u, int v) {return find(u) == find(v);}
    il bool uni(int u, int v) {
        u = find(u), v = find(v);
        if (u == v) return false;
        fa[u] = v;
        return true;
    }
    UnionFind() {
        FOR(i, 1, maxn - 5) fa[i] = i;
        return;
    }
} ufs;

struct Edge {
    int u, v, w;
    il bool operator<(const Edge &rhs) const {return w < rhs.w;}
} e[maxm];

vector<pair<int, int>> tree[maxn];
int fap[maxn], fa[maxn], n, m, k, vis[maxn];
ll totw;

void dfs(int u, int pre) {
    if (pre == -1) fap[u] = 1e7;
    vis[u] = true, fa[u] = pre;
    for (auto &p : tree[u]) {
        int &v = p.first;
        if (vis[v]) continue;
        fap[v] = p.second, dfs(v, u);
    }
    return;
}

int main() {
    cin >> n >> m >> k;
    FOR(i, 1, m) cin >> e[i].u >> e[i].v >> e[i].w;
    sort(e + 1, e + m + 1);
    FOR(i, 1, m) if (ufs.uni(e[i].u, e[i].v)) {
        totw += e[i].w;
        tree[e[i].u].push_back({e[i].v, e[i].w});
        tree[e[i].v].push_back({e[i].u, e[i].w});
    }

    S = 2 * n + k + 1, T = S + 1;
    FOR(i, 1, n) flow.addEdge(i, n + i, 1, 0);
    FOR(i, 1, k) {
        flow.addEdge(S, 2 * n + i, 1, 0);
        int s; cin >> s;
        while (s--) {
            int v; cin >> v;
            flow.addEdge(2 * n + i, v, 1, 0);
        }
    }

    FOR(i, 1, n) if (!vis[i]) dfs(i, -1), totw += 1e7;

    FOR(i, 1, n) {
        flow.addEdge(n + i, T, 1, fap[i]);
        if (~fa[i]) flow.addEdge(n + i, fa[i], 1, 0);
    }

    auto ret = flow.work();
    ll ans = totw - ret.second;
    cout << ((ans >= 1e7 || ret.first < k) ? -1 : ans);

    return 0;
}

item.title: ABC239Ex - Dice Product 2
item.description:
Description

åˆå§‹æ‹¥æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ•° \(M = 1\)ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡ä» \([1, n]\) ä¸­éšä¸€ä¸ªæ•´æ•° \(x\) å‡ºæ¥ç„¶åè®© \(M\leftarrow M \times x\)ï¼Œå½“ \(M > m\) æ—¶åœæ­¢æ“ä½œã€‚

æ±‚æœŸæœ›è¿›è¡Œçš„æ“ä½œæ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œç­”æ¡ˆå¯¹ \(998244353\) å–æ¨¡ã€‚

\(n,m\le 10^9\)ã€‚

Solution

é¦–å…ˆ dp å¼å­å¾ˆå¥½æƒ³ï¼Œä»¤ \(f_i\) ä¸ºå½“å‰ \(M = i\) çš„å‰©ä½™æœŸæœ›æ­¥æ•°ï¼Œåˆ™æ˜¾ç„¶ \[ f_i = \frac{n}{n - 1}\left(1 + \frac1n\sum_{j=2}^nf_{ij}\right) \] æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ \(O(m\log m)\)ï¼Œè¿‡ä¸å»ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘ä¼˜åŒ–ã€‚

æ‰“è¡¨å‘ç°å¯¹äº \(\lfloor m / i\rfloor\) ç›¸åŒçš„ \(i\)ï¼Œå…¶ dp å€¼æ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸€å…±æœ‰ \(O(\sqrt m)\) æ®µæœ‰æ„ä¹‰çš„ dp å€¼ï¼Œç›´æ¥ç¼©è¿ç»­æ®µçš„åŒ–å¯ä»¥ä¼˜åŒ–åˆ° \(O(n\sqrt m\log m)\)ï¼ˆå¯¹äº \(n\) è¾ƒå°çš„æƒ…å†µï¼‰ã€‚

é‚£ä¹ˆä¸å¦¨å°† \(\lfloor m / i\rfloor\) ä½œä¸ºä¸‹æ ‡ï¼Œè®¾å‡º dp çŠ¶æ€ \(g_i\)ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæ ¹æ® \(\displaystyle\left\lfloor\frac{m}{ik}\right\rfloor = \left\lfloor\frac{\lfloor m / i\rfloor}{k}\right\rfloor\)ï¼Œåˆ™æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥çŸ¥é“ \(g_i\) çš„è½¬ç§»ï¼š \[ g_i = \frac{n}{n - 1}\left(1 + \frac1n\sum_{j=2}^ng_{\left\lfloor \frac ij\right\rfloor}\right) \] è¿™ä¸ªä¸œè¥¿ç±»ä¼¼æœæ•™ç­›é‚£æ ·å¤„ç†å°±å¯ä»¥äº†ï¼Œæ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ \(\displaystyle\int_2^{\sqrt m}\left(\sqrt x +\sqrt{\frac mx}\right)\mathrm{d}x = O\left(m^{\frac34}\right)\)ã€‚

Implementation

æ³¨æ„ç»†èŠ‚ï¼Œè¾¹ç•Œï¼Œè¾¹ç•Œï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼\(\lfloor m / l\rfloor = 0\) çš„æ—¶å€™ä¸ç‰¹åˆ¤ä¼šå»ä¸–ï¼

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <atcoder/modint>
using namespace std;
using mint = atcoder::modint1000000007;
unordered_map<int, mint> F;
int n, m;
mint inv;

mint getF(int m) {
    if (F.count(m)) return F[m];
    mint ret = n;
    for (int l = 2, r; l <= n; l = r + 1) {
        if (m / l == 0) break;
        r = min(n, m / (m / l));
        ret += getF(m / l) * (r - l + 1);
    }
    return F[m] = ret * inv;
}

int main() {
    cin >> n >> m;
    F[0] = 1, inv = mint(n - 1).inv();
    cout << getF(m).val() << endl;
    return 0;
}

item.title: ã€IZhO 2022 Day 1 Aã€‘ Where is the legend?
item.description:
Description

ä¼ é€é—¨ã€‚

å¤šæµ‹ï¼Œç»™å®šé•¿ä¸º \(n\) çš„åºåˆ— \(a_i\)ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡æ“ä½œå¯ä»¥å°†æ»¡è¶³ \(a_i = \dfrac{a_{i-1} + a_{i +1}}{2}\) çš„ \(a_i\) åˆ å»ï¼Œå‰©ä½™æ•°ä¾æ¬¡è¡¥ä½ã€‚é—®èƒ½è¾¾åˆ°çš„æœ€å°é•¿åº¦ã€‚

\(\sum n\le 3\times 10^5\)ï¼Œ\(1\le a_i\le 10^9\)ã€‚

Solution

é¦–å…ˆè€ƒè™‘å·®åˆ†æ•°ç»„ï¼Œé—®é¢˜å˜ä¸ºå°†ä¸¤ä¸ªç›¸é‚»çš„ç›¸åŒæ•°åˆå¹¶ä¸ºåŸæ¥çš„äºŒå€ã€‚

è€Œä¸”è€ƒè™‘åˆ°èƒ½å¤Ÿåˆå¹¶çš„ \(x\) è‚¯å®šéƒ½æ»¡è¶³æ­£è´Ÿæ€§ç›¸åŒä¸” \(x / \mathrm{lowbit}(x)\) ç›¸åŒã€‚æ‰€ä»¥æŒ‰æ­¤åˆ†æ®µæ¥åšã€‚

é‚£ä¹ˆä¸å¦¨è®¾æœ´ç´ çš„ dpï¼š\(f_i\) è¡¨ç¤ºè€ƒè™‘å‰ \(i\) ä¸ªæ•°çš„ç­”æ¡ˆï¼Œåˆ™æˆ‘ä»¬ä¸€å®šæœ‰ \(f_i = 1\)ï¼Œä¸”å¯¹äºä¸€ä¸ª \(r\) æ¥è¯´ï¼Œè‹¥ \([l, r]\) èƒ½è¢«åˆå¹¶ï¼Œåˆ™ \(f_r\) å¯ä»¥ç”± \(f_{l - 1} + 1\) è½¬ç§»è€Œæ¥ã€‚

æ‰€ä»¥ç±»ä¼¼å€å¢åœ°é¢„å¤„ç†ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹èƒ½è·³åˆ°å“ªé‡Œï¼Œç„¶åé¡ºå¸¦æ›´æ–° dp å€¼å³å¯ã€‚

Implementation

const int maxn = 3e5 + 5;
int f[maxn], a[maxn], d[maxn], n;
map<int, int> g[maxn];

int main() {
    int T; cin >> T;
    while (T--) {
        cin >> n;
        FOR(i, 1, n) {
            cin >> a[i];
            g[i].clear();
        }
        FOR(i, 1, n - 1) d[i] = a[i + 1] - a[i];
        f[0] = 1;
        FOR(i, 1, n - 1) {
            g[i][d[i]] = i - 1;
            f[i] = f[i - 1] + 1;
            for (int x = d[i]; g[g[i][x]].count(x); x <<= 1) {
                g[i][x << 1] = g[g[i][x]][x];
                chkmin(f[i], f[g[i][x << 1]] + 1);
            }
        }
        cout << f[n - 1] << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

item.title: AGC013C - Ants on a Circle
item.description:
Description

ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªé•¿åº¦ä¸º \(L\) çš„åœ†ç¯ï¼Œä¸Šé¢æœ‰ \(N\) ä¸ªèš‚èšï¼Œä½ç½®åˆ†åˆ« \(x_i\)ï¼Œè¿åŠ¨æ–¹å‘ä¸º \(d_i\)ï¼Œ\(1\) ä¸º CWï¼Œ\(2\) ä¸º CCWã€‚æ¯åªèš‚èšä¼šä»¥å•ä½é€Ÿåº¦è¿åŠ¨ï¼Œè‹¥ä¸¤åªèš‚èšç›¸é‡ä»–ä»¬ä¼šåŒæ—¶æ‰å¤´ç»§ç»­è¿åŠ¨ï¼Œä¿è¯ \(x_i\) åˆå§‹å•è°ƒã€‚

é—® \(T\) ç§’åå„ä¸ªèš‚èšçš„åæ ‡ã€‚\(1\le N\le 10^5\)ï¼Œ\(1\le L, T\le 10^9\)ã€‚

Solution

é¦–å…ˆæœ‰ä¸ªç»å…¸çš„æƒ³æ³•ï¼šä¸¤åªèš‚èšç›¸é‡çš„æ—¶å€™çœ‹ä½œä»–ä»¬â€œçµé­‚â€äº¤æ¢ï¼Œä½†è‚‰ä½“è¿˜æ˜¯ç»§ç»­èµ°ä¸‹å»ã€‚

é‚£ä¹ˆç°åœ¨çš„é—®é¢˜å°±è½¬åŒ–æˆäº†å¦‚ä½•æ±‚å‡ºæœ€åæ¯ä¸ªèš‚èšçš„æ ‡å·ã€‚

èš‚èšçš„ç›¸å¯¹ä½ç½®æ˜¯ä¸ä¼šæ”¹å˜çš„ï¼Œæˆ–è€…è¯´ï¼Œç­”æ¡ˆå’Œ \((x_i + T)\bmod L\) æœ‰â€œå¾ªç¯ç§»ä½â€çš„å…³ç³»ã€‚å› ä¸ºè‹¥æˆ‘ä»¬è€ƒè™‘èš‚èšä¹‹é—´åˆ›æ¥åˆ›å»ï¼Œç›¸å¯¹ä½ç½®æ˜¯ä¸ä¼šå‘ç”Ÿæ”¹å˜çš„ã€‚

å½“ç„¶æˆ‘æ˜¯é€šè¿‡å¤§åŠ›è§‚å¯Ÿæ ·ä¾‹å‘ç°çš„è¿™ä¸ªæ€§è´¨ã€‚

é‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬å°±å¯ä»¥è€ƒè™‘ç›´æ¥æ±‚ä¸€ä¸ªèš‚èšçš„ç¼–å·ï¼Œç„¶åä¾æ­¤è¿˜åŸå‡ºå‰©ä¸‹æ‰€æœ‰çš„èš‚èšã€‚

å‡è®¾æˆ‘ä»¬æ±‚ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªèš‚èšçš„ç¼–å·ï¼Œè‹¥å°†ç¯çœ‹ä½œåŒç«¯é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼Œåˆ™è‹¥æœ‰èš‚èšä» \(0\to L - 1\)ï¼Œåˆ™ç›¸å½“äºé˜Ÿé¦–å…ƒç´ è·‘åˆ°é˜Ÿå°¾å»äº†ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥é˜Ÿé¦–åºå· \(+1\)ï¼Œå¦åˆ™è‹¥æ˜¯æœ‰èš‚èšä» \(L - 1\to 0\)ï¼Œåˆ™é˜Ÿé¦–ç¼–å· \(-1\)ã€‚

Implementation

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define il inline
#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = (a); i <= (b); ++i)

using namespace std;
const int maxn = 1e5 + 5;
int T, L, N, x[maxn], d[maxn], cnt;

int main() {
    cin >> N >> L >> T;
    FOR(i, 0, N - 1) {
        cin >> x[i] >> d[i];
        x[i] += (d[i] == 1 ? T : -T);
        cnt = (cnt + (int)floor(1.0 * x[i] / L) % N + N) % N;
        x[i] = (x[i] % L + L) % L;
    }
    sort(x, x + N);
    FOR(i, 0, N - 1) cout << x[(i + cnt) % N] << endl;
    return 0;
}

item.title: ARC064D - Rotated Palindromes
item.description:
Description

æŒ‰å¦‚ä¸‹è¦æ±‚æ„é€ åºåˆ— \(a\)ï¼šé•¿ä¸º \(n\)ï¼Œå€¼åŸŸ \([1, k]\) çš„æ•´æ•°åºåˆ— \(a\)ï¼Œåˆå§‹ä¸ºå›æ–‡ï¼Œç„¶åå¯ä»¥ shift ä»»æ„æ¬¡ã€‚é—®æœ€åèƒ½æ„é€ å‡ºå¤šå°‘ç§æœ¬è´¨ä¸åŒçš„ \(a\)ã€‚

\(1\le n,k\le 10^9\)ï¼Œç­”æ¡ˆå¯¹ \(10^9 + 7\) å–æ¨¡ã€‚

Solution

æ•°æ®èŒƒå›´æœ‰ç‚¹å“ˆäººã€‚é‚£åº”è¯¥å°±æ˜¯ç”³å¿…è®¡æ•°é¢˜ã€‚

ä¸å¦¨è€ƒè™‘å¯¹æ‰€æœ‰å›æ–‡ä¸²è®¡æ•°å…¶èƒ½å˜å½¢æˆå¤šå°‘ä¸åŒçš„ä¸²ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ç”±äºä¸€ä¸ªä¸²å¯èƒ½å½¢æˆè‹¥ä¸ªç›¸åŒçš„å¾ªç¯ç§»ä½ï¼Œä¸”å¤šä¸ªä¸²å¯èƒ½å¾ªç¯ç§»ä½åç­‰ä»·ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥éœ€è¦è®¤çœŸè€ƒè™‘å¦‚ä½•å»é‡ã€‚

ä¸€èˆ¬åœ°ï¼Œå¯¹ä¸€ä¸ªä¸²è€Œè¨€ï¼Œå…¶èƒ½å½¢æˆçš„å¾ªç¯ç§»ä½ä¸ªæ•°å³ä¸ºå…¶å¾ªç¯èŠ‚çš„é•¿åº¦ã€‚å¿½ç•¥åé¢é‚£ä¸ªé—®é¢˜çš„è¯ï¼Œæšä¸¾æ‰€æœ‰å¾ªç¯èŠ‚é•¿åº¦ \(d\) å¯¹åº”çš„æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•° \(f(d)\)ï¼Œæœ€åçš„ç­”æ¡ˆå³ä¸º \(\displaystyle\sum_{d\mid n}df(d)\)ã€‚è€Œä¸”é€šè¿‡è§‚å¯Ÿå‘ç°ï¼Œå¾ªç¯èŠ‚ä¹Ÿå¿…å®šæ˜¯å›æ–‡ä¸²ã€‚

ç°åœ¨è€ƒè™‘å¤šä¸ªä¸²å¾ªç¯ç§»ä½åå¯èƒ½ç­‰ä»·çš„é—®é¢˜ã€‚å¦‚ä½•åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Ÿæ‰‹ç©å‘ç°åªæœ‰é•¿ä¸ºå¶æ•°çš„å›æ–‡ä¸²æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå¾ªç¯åŒæ„ï¼š1221 å’Œ 2112ï¼Œè€Œé•¿åº¦ä¸ºå¥‡æ•°çš„ \(AcA^r\) å‹æ˜¯ä¸ä¼šæœ‰å¾ªç¯åŒæ„çš„ã€‚äºæ˜¯æœ€åçš„ç­”æ¡ˆ \[ \frac12\sum_{2\mid d,d\mid n} df(d) + \sum_{2\not\mid d, d\mid n}df(d) \] ç°åœ¨è€ƒè™‘æ±‚ \(f(d)\)ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ˜¯å›æ–‡çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ˜¾ç„¶ä¸º \(k^{\lceil d / 2\rceil}\)ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å¯èƒ½ä¼šå’Œå¾ªç¯èŠ‚æ›´å°çš„ä¸²ç®—é‡ï¼Œé‚£å°±å®¹æ–¥æ‰å³å¯ï¼Œå³ï¼š \[ f(d) = k^{\lceil d / 2\rceil} - \sum_{g\mid d}f(d) \] å†™äº†ä¸ªæ¯”è¾ƒåŠ£çš„ \(O(\sqrt n + d^2(n)\log n)\) åšæ³•ã€‚

Implementation

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <atcoder/all>
#define il inline
#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = (a); i <= (b); ++i)

using namespace std;

using mint = atcoder::modint1000000007;
const int mod = mint().mod(), maxn = 1e7 + 5;
const mint inv2 = mint(2).inv();
int n, k, d[maxn], tot;
mint f[maxn], ans;

int main() {
    cin >> n >> k;
    for (int i = 1; i * i <= n; ++i) {
        if (n % i) continue;
        d[++tot] = i;
        if (i * i != n) d[++tot] = n / i;
    }
    sort(&d[1], &d[tot] + 1);
    FOR(i, 1, tot) {
        f[i] = atcoder::pow_mod(k, (d[i] + 1) >> 1, mod);
        FOR(j, 1, i - 1) if (!(d[i] % d[j])) f[i] -= f[j];
        ans += (d[i] & 1) ? d[i] * f[i] : d[i] * f[i] * inv2;
    }
    cout << ans.val() << endl;
    return 0;
}

item.title: AGC002E - Candy Piles
item.description:
Description

\(n\) å †ç³–æœ \(a_{1,\cdots, n}\)ï¼Œè½®æµåƒã€‚è¦ä¹ˆå°†æœ€å¤§ä¸€å †åƒæ‰ï¼Œè¦ä¹ˆå°†æ¯å †åƒæ‰ä¸€ä¸ªã€‚åƒå®Œçš„äººè¾“ï¼Œå‡è®¾ä¸¤äººç»é¡¶èªæ˜ï¼Œé—®è°å¿…èƒœã€‚\(n\le 10^5\)ï¼Œ\(a_i\le 10^9\)ã€‚

Solution

å·§å¦™çš„æ¨¡å‹è½¬åŒ–ï¼Œæƒ³ä¸åˆ°å°±å¯„ï¼Œè€Œä¸”ä¹Ÿæ²¡åšåšå¼ˆè®ºçš„é¢˜çš„ç»éªŒã€‚

è€ƒè™‘å°†æ¯å †ç³–æœæ’å¥½åºååŒ–æˆé˜¶æ¢¯å½¢çŠ¶ï¼š

0000
00000
00000
000000
00000000

åˆ™ä¸€æ¬¡æ“ä½œç­‰ä»·äºåˆ æ‰å½“å‰ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œæˆ–ç¬¬ä¸€åˆ—ã€‚å†å°†å…¶è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºç½‘æ ¼å›¾åå‘ç°è¾¹æ˜¯ä»å·¦ä¸‹è§’æ¯æ¬¡å¾€ä¸Šæˆ–æ˜¯å¾€å³èµ°ï¼Œè¾¹ç•Œç‚¹ä¸ºå¿…èƒœæ€ï¼ˆå› ä¸ºä½ æ³¨æ„åˆ°æ˜¯åšæœ€åä¸€æ­¥çš„äººå¯„è€Œä¸æ˜¯æ— æ³•æ“ä½œçš„äººå¯„ï¼‰ã€‚

åšå¼ˆè®ºçš„ç»å…¸ç»“è®ºï¼ˆæˆ‘ä¸ä¼šï¼Œå“ˆå“ˆå“ˆï¼‰

  • ä¸€ä¸ªæ€ä¸ºå¿…èƒœæ€å½“ä¸”ä»…å½“å…¶èƒ½è½¬ç§»åˆ°çš„æ€ä¸­æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªä¸ºå¿…è´¥æ€ã€‚
  • ä¸€ä¸ªæ€ä¸ºå¿…è´¥æ€å½“ä¸”ä»…å½“å…¶èƒ½è½¬ç§»åˆ°çš„æ€ä¸­å…¨éƒ¨ä¸ºå¿…èƒœæ€ã€‚

äºæ˜¯æœ¬é¢˜çš„ \(O(n^2)\) åšæ³•å°±æœ‰äº†ï¼Œç›´æ¥ä»è¾¹ç•Œå¼€å§‹è½¬ç§»å³å¯ã€‚

ä½†æ˜¯æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦å¾ˆæ˜¾ç„¶æ˜¯å¯„çš„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ç”±äºæˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€è¦çŸ¥é“å·¦ä¸‹è§’çš„æ€ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¯ä»¥è€ƒè™‘æ‰¾è§„å¾‹ä¼˜åŒ–ä¸€ä¸‹ã€‚

æˆ‘ä»¬æƒŠå¥‡çš„å‘ç°ï¼Œé™¤äº†è¾¹ç•Œï¼ŒåŒä¸€å¯¹è§’çº¿ä¸Šéƒ½æ˜¯åŒç±»å‹çš„ç‚¹ã€‚å…·ä½“è¯æ˜è€ƒè™‘åè¯ï¼Œä¼šå‘ç°è‹¥å¯¹è§’çº¿ä¸Šä¸æ˜¯åŒä¸€ç±»å‹çš„ç‚¹çš„è¯ä¼šæ— æ³•ç»§ç»­æ‰©å±•ã€‚

é‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬å°±åªéœ€è¦çŸ¥é“æ•´ä¸ªç½‘æ ¼å›¾æœ€å·¦ä¸‹è§’çš„æå¤§æ­£æ–¹å½¢çš„å³ä¸Šé¡¶ç‚¹æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆæ€å°±å¯ä»¥äº†ã€‚

Implementation

const int maxn = 2e5 + 5;
int a[maxn], n;

int main() {
    cin >> n;
    FOR(i, 1, n) cin >> a[i];
    sort(a + 1, a + n + 1, greater<int>());
    FOR(i, 1, n) {
        if (i + 1 > a[i + 1]) {
            bool ans = 0;
            for (int j = i + 1; a[j] == i; ++j) ans ^= 1; // å‘å³èµ°çš„æƒ…å†µ
            ans |= (a[i] - i) & 1; // å‘ä¸Šèµ°çš„æƒ…å†µ
            puts(ans ? "First" : "Second");
            return 0;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}

ä½†æ˜¯è‡ªå·±å†™çš„æ—¶å€™è¿˜æ˜¯é‡åˆ°äº†å›°éš¾ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚

item.title: AGC001E - BBQ Hard
item.description:
Description

ç»™å®š \(a_{1,\cdots, n}\) å’Œ \(b_{1,\cdots n}\)ï¼Œæ±‚ \[ \sum_{i=1}^n\sum_{j=i+1}^n\binom{a_i + b_i + a_j + b_j}{a_i + a_j} \] ç­”æ¡ˆå¯¹ \(10^9 + 7\) å–æ¨¡ã€‚\(n\le 2\times 10^5\)ï¼Œ\(a_i,b_i\le 2000\)ã€‚

Solution

å›å¿† \(\dbinom{n + m}{n}\) çš„ç»„åˆæ„ä¹‰ï¼šæ£‹ç›˜ä¸Šä» \((0, 0)\) èµ°åˆ° \((n, m)\) çš„è·¯å¾„æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°ã€‚

é‚£ä¹ˆ \(\dbinom{a_i + b_i + a_j + b_j}{a_i + a_j}\) çš„ç»„åˆæ„ä¹‰å³ä¸ºä» \((-a_i,-b_i)\) èµ°åˆ° \((a_j, b_j)\) çš„è·¯å¾„æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°ã€‚

ç„¶åç°åœ¨è¦æ±‚å‡ºæ¯ä¸€å¯¹ \((i,j)\) ä» \((-a_i, -b_i)\) åˆ° \((a_j, b_j)\) çš„è·¯å¾„æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°ã€‚

è¿™ä¸ªä¸œè¥¿å¯ä»¥æ”¾åœ¨æ£‹ç›˜ä¸Šä¸€èµ· dpï¼Œæ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ \(O(\max^2 v)\)ã€‚

æ³¨æ„æœ€åè¦æŠŠæ‰€æœ‰çš„ä» \((-a_i,-b_i)\) èµ°åˆ° \((a_i, b_i)\) çš„æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°å»é‡æ‰ï¼Œå‡å» \(\dbinom{2a_i+2b_i}{2a_i}\) å³å¯ã€‚ç„¶åå› ä¸ºé¢˜ç›®é‡Œé¢é’¦å®š \(j > i\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æœ€åè¦é™¤ä»¥äºŒã€‚

Implementation

using mint = atcoder::modint1000000007;
using fastIO::is;
using fastIO::os;

const int maxn = 2e5 + 5, maxm = 4e3 + 5, shift = 2001;
mint f[maxm][maxm], fac[maxm << 1], ifac[maxm << 1];
int n, a[maxn], b[maxn];

int main() {
    is >> n;
    FOR(i, 1, n) {
        is >> a[i] >> b[i];
        ++f[-a[i] + shift][-b[i] + shift];
    }
    FOR(i, -2000, 2000) {
        FOR(j, -2000, 2000) {
            const int &x = i + shift, &y = j + shift;
            f[x][y] += f[x - 1][y] + f[x][y - 1];
        }
    }
    fac[0] = 1;
    FOR(i, 1, 8000) fac[i] = fac[i - 1] * i;
    ifac[8000] = fac[8000].inv();
    DEC(i, 8000 - 1, 0) ifac[i] = (i + 1) * ifac[i + 1];
    auto binom = [](const int &n, const int &m) {return fac[n] * ifac[m] * ifac[n - m];};
    mint ans = 0;
    FOR(i, 1, n) ans += f[a[i] + shift][b[i] + shift] - binom(2 * a[i] + 2 * b[i], 2 * b[i]);
    ans /= 2;
    os << ans.val();
    return 0;
}

item.title: AGC012F - Prefix Median
item.description:
Description

ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªé•¿åº¦ä¸º \(2n - 1\) çš„åºåˆ— \(a\)ï¼Œå¯ä»¥éšæ„æ’åˆ— \(a\) ä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ ï¼Œè¯·æ±‚å‡ºèƒ½æ„é€ å‡ºå¤šå°‘ç§ä¸åŒçš„åºåˆ— \(b\)ï¼Œæ»¡è¶³ \(b\) çš„é•¿åº¦ä¸º \(n\)ï¼Œä¸” \(b_i = \mathrm{median}\{a_1, \cdots, a_{2i - 1}\}\)ã€‚\(n\le 50\)ï¼Œç­”æ¡ˆå¯¹ \(10^9 + 7\) å–æ¨¡ã€‚

Solution

è¿˜æ˜¯å¾ˆç‰›é€¼çš„é¢˜ã€‚

é¦–å…ˆè‚¯å®šè€ƒè™‘ç›´æ¥å¯¹ \(b\) åºåˆ—è®¡æ•°ã€‚

Key Point \(1\)ï¼š\(b_n\) æ˜¯ \(a\) çš„ä¸­ä½æ•°ï¼Œæ˜¯ç¡®å®šçš„å€¼ã€‚

é‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸å¦¨å€’åºæ„é€ ç­”æ¡ˆï¼Œå…ˆå°† \(a\) ä»å°åˆ°å¤§æ’åºï¼Œç„¶åæ¯æ¬¡åˆ ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°æ¥æ„é€ å¯¹åº”çš„ \(b_i\)ã€‚

è€Œä¸”æˆ‘ä»¬æ‰‹ç©ä¸€ä¸‹å¯ä»¥å‘ç°å¦ä¸€ä¸ªæ€§è´¨ï¼š

Key Point 2ï¼šæ¯æ¬¡åˆ ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°åï¼Œ\(b_i\) åœ¨ \(a\) ä¸­çš„ä½ç½®è‡³å¤šç§»åŠ¨ \(1\)ã€‚

è€ƒè™‘æ¯æ¬¡åˆ å¤§äºä¸­ä½æ•°çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œå°äºä¸­ä½æ•°çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°æˆ–è€…åˆ†å±…ä¸¤ä¾§çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ã€‚

ç”±æ­¤å¯ä»¥æ¨å‡ºç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…³é”®ç»“è®ºï¼š

Lemma 1ï¼šä¸€ä¸ª \(b\) åºåˆ—åˆæ³•çš„å¿…è¦æ¡ä»¶æ˜¯ \(a_i\le b_i\le a_{2n - i}\)ã€‚

è€ƒè™‘å…¶å¾€ä¸¤ä¾§çš„æœ€å¤§ç§»åŠ¨è·ç¦»ã€‚

ä½†æ˜¯æœ‰äº†è¿™ä¸ªæ¡ä»¶è¿˜æ˜¯ä¸å¤Ÿï¼Œç»§ç»­æ€è€ƒã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬æ³¨æ„åˆ°ï¼Œ\(b_i\) æ¯æ¬¡çš„ç§»åŠ¨æœ‰å¯èƒ½è·¨è¿‡è¢«åˆ é™¤çš„æ•°ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è¿™äº›æ•°ä¸€å®šå°±ä¸ä¼šå‡ºç°åœ¨å‰©ä¸‹çš„ \(b\) ä¸­äº†ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç»“åˆ Key Point 2 æ¨å‡ºå¦‚ä¸‹ç»“è®ºï¼š

Lemma 2ï¼šä¸€ä¸ªåˆæ³•çš„åºåˆ—ä¸­ï¼Œä¸å­˜åœ¨ \(i < j\) ä½¿å¾— \(b_j<b_i<b_{j+1}\) æˆ– \(b_j > b_i > b_{j+ 1}\)ã€‚

å› ä¸º \(b_j\) å’Œ \(b_{j + 1}\) ä¸­é—´è·¨è¿‡çš„æ•°ä¸å¯èƒ½å†åœ¨ \(b_i\) å‡ºç°äº†ã€‚

è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªæ¡ä»¶ç»“åˆåœ¨ä¸€èµ·å°±å˜æˆå……è¦çš„äº†ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå¯¹äºæ»¡è¶³ä¸Šè¿°æ€§è´¨çš„ \(b\)ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸€å®šèƒ½æ„é€ å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªç¬¦åˆæ¡ä»¶çš„ \(a\) çš„åˆ é™¤åºåˆ—å‡ºæ¥ã€‚

è€Œä¸”æ³¨æ„åˆ°ï¼Œæ„é€  \(b\) çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€è¦çŸ¥é“æœ€å·¦è¾¹å‰©ä¸‹å¤šå°‘å¯é€‰æ•°ï¼Œä»¥åŠæœ€å³è¾¹å‰©ä¸‹å¤šå°‘å¯é€‰æ•°ã€‚

å‰©ä¸‹çš„é—®é¢˜å°±æ˜¯ dp è®¡æ•°ã€‚å€’ç€ dpï¼Œè®¾ \(f_{i,j,k}\) ä¸ºè€ƒè™‘ \(b_i\)ï¼Œæ¯”ä»–å°çš„å¯é€‰æ•°æœ‰ \(j\) ç§ï¼Œæ¯”ä»–å¤§çš„å¯é€‰æ•°æœ‰ \(k\) ç§çš„æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°ã€‚å…ˆè€ƒè™‘è®¾ \(l = [a_i\ne a_{i - 1}]\)ï¼Œ\(r = [a_{2n - i}\ne a_{2n - i + 1}]\)ã€‚è¡¨ç¤ºå½“å‰è½¬ç§»èƒ½å¦æ–°å¢åŠ èƒ½å¡«çš„æ•°ï¼ˆéœ€è¦è€ƒè™‘æœ‰äº›æ•°æ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„ï¼‰ã€‚

  • \(f_{i - 1, j + l, k + r}\leftarrow f_{i-1,j+l,k+r} + f_{i,j,k}\)ï¼Œå³å½“å‰è¿˜æ˜¯å¡«ä¸Šæ¬¡çš„æ•°ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä¸¤è¾¹ä¼šå¤šå‡º \(l\) æˆ– \(r\) ä¸ªå¯ä»¥å¡«ã€‚
  • \(f_{i - 1, t, k + r + 1} \leftarrow f_{i-1,t,k+r+1} + f_{i,j,k}(t<j + l)\)ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºå°†å¡«ä¸€ä¸ªæ›´å°çš„æ•°ï¼Œå·¦è¾¹è¿˜å‰©ä¸‹ \(t\) ä¸ªå¯ä»¥å¡«ï¼Œä¹‹å‰æœ¬æ¥å¡«çš„å˜åˆ°å³è¾¹ã€‚
  • \(f_{i-1,j+l+1, t}\leftarrow f_{i-1,j+l+1,t} + f_{i,j,k}(t<k + r)\)ï¼ŒåŒç†ã€‚

åˆå§‹åŒ– \(f_{n, 0, 0} = 1\)ã€‚çŠ¶æ€ \(O(n^3)\)ï¼Œè½¬ç§» \(O(n)\)ï¼Œæ€»æ—¶é—´ \(O(n^4)\)ã€‚

Implementation

using fastIO::is;
using fastIO::os;
using mint = atcoder::modint1000000007;
const int maxn = 105;
int n, a[maxn];
mint f[maxn][maxn][maxn];

int main() {
    is >> n;
    int m = 2 * n - 1;
    FOR(i, 1, m) is >> a[i];
    sort(a + 1, a + m + 1);
    f[n][0][0] = 1;
    DEC(i, n, 2) {
        const int &l = (a[i] != a[i - 1]), &r = (a[m - i + 1] != a[m - i + 2]);
        FOR(j, 0, m) {
            FOR(k, 0, m) {
                if (!f[i][j][k].val()) continue;
                f[i - 1][j + l][k + r] += f[i][j][k];
                FOR(t, 0, j + l - 1) f[i - 1][t][k + r + 1] += f[i][j][k];
                FOR(t, 0, k + r - 1) f[i - 1][j + l + 1][t] += f[i][j][k];
            }
        }
    }
    mint ans = 0;
    FOR(i, 0, m) FOR(j, 0, m) ans += f[1][i][j];
    os << ans.val();
    return 0;
}

item.title: ARC068D - Solitaire
item.description:
Description

å°† \(1\sim n\) ä¾æ¬¡åŠ å…¥åŒç«¯é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼Œå†åŒç«¯åˆ é™¤ï¼Œé—®æœ‰å¤šå°‘ç§åˆ é™¤åºåˆ—æ»¡è¶³ \(1\) æ˜¯ç¬¬ \(k\) ä¸ªè¢«åˆ ã€‚åŸé¢˜ \(1\le k\le n \le 3\times 10^5\)ï¼ŒåŠ å¼ºè¦æ±‚ \(O(n)\)ã€‚

Solution

é¦–å…ˆè¿™ä¸ªåŒç«¯é˜Ÿåˆ—åœ¨åˆ é™¤ä¹‹å‰ä¸€å®šæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª V å­—å½¢ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å–å‡º \(1\) ä¹‹ååŒç«¯é˜Ÿåˆ—å†…çš„å…ƒç´ æ˜¯å•è°ƒçš„ï¼Œå‡è®¾å–å‡º \(1\) ä¹‹åçš„ \(n - m - 1\) ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ä¹Ÿæ˜¯è¢«ä»ä¸€ç«¯å•è°ƒåœ°å–å‡ºæ¥çš„ï¼Œç„¶åæˆ‘ä»¬å»ç»Ÿè®¡æ»¡è¶³è¯¥æ€§è´¨çš„åˆ é™¤åºåˆ—çš„æ•°é‡ï¼Œæœ€åå†ä¹˜ä¸Š \(2^{n - m - 1}\)ã€‚è€Œæ˜¾ç„¶æ»¡è¶³è¯¥æ€§è´¨çš„åˆ é™¤åºåˆ— \(p\) æ»¡è¶³èƒ½è¢«åˆ’åˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤ä¸ªå•è°ƒé€’å‡å­åºåˆ—ï¼ˆè€ƒè™‘åˆ é™¤åºåˆ—æ˜¯å¦‚ä½•è¢«æ„é€ å‡ºæ¥çš„ï¼‰ã€‚æ ¹æ® Dilworth å¼•ç†ï¼Œåˆ é™¤åºåˆ— \(p\) ä¸­ä¸å­˜åœ¨é¡ºæ¬¡é€’å¢çš„ä¸‰é¡¹ã€‚

æ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘ä»¬è¦è®¡æ•°çš„å°±æ˜¯æ»¡è¶³ \(p_k = 1\) çš„åºåˆ—ä¸ªæ•°ã€‚ç„¶è€Œè¿™ä¸ªé™åˆ¶çœ‹ä¸Šå»å°±å¾ˆæ‹‰è·¨ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è€ƒè™‘å…¶é€†æ’åˆ— \(q_{p_i} = i\)ï¼Œå‘ç°è‹¥ \(p\) æ»¡è¶³ä¸Šè¿°æ€§è´¨ï¼Œåˆ™ \(q\) ä¹Ÿä¼šæ»¡è¶³ã€‚

ç°åœ¨é—®é¢˜å°±å˜æˆäº†å¯¹ \(q_1 = k\) çš„ \(q\) è®¡æ•°ã€‚è€ƒè™‘ä¸€ä¸ª dpã€‚ä»¤ \(f_{n,i}\) ä¸ºé•¿åº¦ä¸º \(n\) ä¸”ç¬¬ä¸€é¡¹ä¸º \(j\) çš„æ’åˆ—æ•°ã€‚

è€ƒè™‘è½¬ç§»ï¼š

  • \(i = n\)ï¼Œåˆ™å…¶ä¸å¯èƒ½å‡ºç°åœ¨é•¿åº¦ä¸º \(3\) çš„ä¸Šå‡å­åºåˆ—ä¸­ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥åˆ æ‰ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ \(f_{n,i} = \displaystyle\sum_{1\le j< i}f_{n -1, j}\)ã€‚
  • \(i < n\)ï¼Œåˆ™è€ƒè™‘ \(q_2\)ï¼š
    • \(q_2 = n\)ï¼Œåˆ™å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä¸ç®¡ï¼Œ\(f_{n, i}\leftarrow f_{n,i} + f_{n - 1, i}\)ã€‚
    • \(i < q_2 < n\)ï¼Œå…¶ä¸åˆæ³•ã€‚
    • \(q_2 < i\)ï¼Œè‹¥ \(i\) åœ¨æŸä¸ªé•¿ä¸º \(3\) çš„ä¸Šå‡å­åºåˆ—ä¸­ï¼Œåˆ™å°† \(i\) æ›¿æ¢ä¸º \(q_2\) ä»ç„¶å¯ä»¥æ»¡è¶³æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œé‚£å°±æ˜¯è¯´ï¼Œåˆ æ‰ \(i\) åï¼Œåºåˆ—ä»åˆæ³•ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥ \(f_{n, i}\leftarrow f_{n, i} + \displaystyle\sum_{1\le j < i}f_{n - 1, j}\)ã€‚

ç»¼ä¸Šï¼Œ\(f_{n, i} = f_{n - 1, i} + \displaystyle\sum_{1\le j<i}f_{n - 1, j} = f_{n- 1, i} +f_{n, i - 1}\)ï¼Œ\(f_{n,1} = f_{n-1,1}\)ï¼Œ\(f_{n,n} = f_{n,n - 1}\)ã€‚ï¼ˆ\(n>1\)ï¼‰

ä¼šå‘ç°è¿™æ˜¯ä¸ªå¾ˆç»å…¸çš„èµ°æ ¼å­ dpï¼Œä» \((2,1)\) å¼€å§‹ï¼ˆå› ä¸ºä¸Šå¼æˆç«‹çš„æ¡ä»¶ä¸º \(n > 1\)ï¼‰ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡å¯ä»¥å‘å³/å‘ä¸Šèµ°ä¸€æ ¼ï¼Œç„¶åä¸èƒ½ç¢°åˆ° \(i = n + 1\) è¿™æ¡çº¿ï¼Œæœ€åèµ°åˆ° \((n, k)\) çš„æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°ã€‚

é¦–å…ˆæ€»æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°æ˜¯ \(\dbinom{n + k - 3}{n - 2}\)ï¼Œç„¶åç”¨ç±»ä¼¼å¡ç‰¹å…°æ•°çš„å¤„ç†æ–¹æ³•å‘ç°å°†ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡ç¢°åˆ° \(i = n+ 1\) ä¹‹åçš„è·¯å¾„ç¿»æŠ˜å¯ä»¥å‘ç°å…¶å”¯ä¸€å¯¹åº”ä» \((2,1)\) åˆ° \((k - 1, n + 1)\) çš„è·¯å¾„ï¼Œæ•…å‡æ‰ä¸åˆæ³•æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•° \(\dbinom{n + k - 3}{n}\)ã€‚

æ‰€ä»¥å¯¹äº \(n > 1\) çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œç­”æ¡ˆä¸º \(\displaystyle 2^{n - k - 1}\times\left(\binom{n + k - 3}{n - 2} - \dbinom{n + k - 3}{n} \right )\)ï¼Œå¦åˆ™æœ‰ \(f_{1,1} = 1\)ã€‚

Implementation

å…¬å¼å·²æ¨å‡ºï¼Œå®ç°ç•¥å»ã€‚

item.title: BZOJ#4767. ä¸¤åŒæ‰‹
item.description:
Description

ä» \((0, 0)\) è¦èµ°åˆ° \((E_x, E_y)\)ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡èƒ½ä» \((x, y)\) èµ°åˆ° \((x + A_x, y + A_y)\) æˆ– \((x + B_x, y + B_y)\)ã€‚ä¸­é—´æœ‰ \(k\) ä¸ªä¸èƒ½èµ°çš„ç‚¹ï¼Œé—®æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°ã€‚

åŸé¢˜ä¿è¯ \(A_xB_y - A_yB_x\ne 0\)ã€‚

\(0\le n,m,k, |A_x|,|A_y|,|B_x|,|B_y|\le 500\)ã€‚

Solution

å…ˆè€ƒè™‘ \(A_xB_y-A_yB_x\ne 0\) çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œæ³¨æ„åˆ°è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªå‘é‡æ„æˆå¹³é¢å†…çš„ä¸€ç»„åŸºï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä»»æ„çš„ç‚¹ \((x, y)\) éƒ½å¯ä»¥è¢«è¡¨ç¤ºä¸º \(cA + dB\)ï¼Œå°†æ‰€æœ‰ç‚¹ \((x,y)\) è½¬ä¸º \((c, d)\)ã€‚é—®é¢˜äºæ˜¯è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºå¸¦éšœç¢çš„ç½‘æ ¼è·¯å¾„è®¡æ•°ã€‚

è®¾æ¢äº†åæ ‡ç³»åç»ˆç‚¹ä¸º \((n, m)\)ï¼Œåˆ™è‹¥æ²¡æœ‰éšœç¢ï¼Œç­”æ¡ˆæ˜¾ç„¶ä¸º \(\dbinom{n + m}{m}\)ã€‚

æœ‰éšœç¢åˆ™éœ€è¦è€ƒè™‘å®¹æ–¥ã€‚

å°†æ‰€æœ‰çš„éšœç¢ç‚¹ä»¥åŠ \((n, m)\) è§†ä¸ºå…³é”®ç‚¹ï¼Œæ’ä¸ªåºï¼Œç„¶åä¾¿ä»¤ \(f_i\) ä¸ºä» \((0, 0)\) å‡ºå‘ï¼Œä¸ç»è¿‡éšœç¢ç‚¹ï¼Œèµ°åˆ°ç¬¬ \(i\) ä¸ªå…³é”®ç‚¹çš„æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°ï¼Œåˆ™ \[ f_i = \binom{x_i + y_i}{x_i}- \sum_{x_j\le x_i\land y_j\le y_i}f_j\times\binom{(x_i - x_j) + (y_i - y_j)}{x_i - x_j} \] äºæ˜¯æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸º \(O(k^2)\)ã€‚

Implementation

using Point = pair<int, int>;
Point p[505];

const int maxn = 1e7 + 5, N = 1e7;
int Ax, Ay, Bx, By, Ex, Ey, K, tot;
modint fac[maxn], ifac[maxn], f[505];

modint binom(int n, int m) {return n < m ? 0 : fac[n] * ifac[m] * ifac[n - m];}

bool convert(int &x, int &y) {
    int rx, ry;
    if ((x * Ay - y * Ax) % (Bx * Ay - Ax * By)) return false;
    else ry = (x * Ay - y * Ax) / (Bx * Ay - Ax * By);
    if ((x * By - y * Bx) % (Ax * By - Bx * Ay)) return false;
    else rx = (x * By - y * Bx) / (Ax * By - Bx * Ay);
    return x = rx, y = ry, true;
}

int main() {
    fac[0] = 1;
    FOR(i, 1, N) fac[i] = i * fac[i - 1];
    ifac[N] = qPow(fac[N], mod - 2);
    DEC(i, N - 1, 0) ifac[i] = (i + 1) * ifac[i + 1];
    read(Ex, Ey, K, Ax, Ay, Bx, By);
    if (!convert(Ex, Ey)) {
        print(0);
    } else {
        p[tot = 1] = {Ex, Ey};
        FOR(i, 1, K) {
            int x, y; read(x, y);
            if (convert(x, y)) p[++tot] = {x, y};
        }
        sort(p + 1, p + tot + 1);
        FOR(i, 1, tot) {
            f[i] = binom(p[i].first + p[i].second, p[i].second);
            FOR(j, 1, i - 1) if (p[j].first <= p[i].first && p[j].second <= p[i].second)
                f[i] -= f[j] * binom(p[i].first - p[j].first + p[i].second - p[j].second, p[i].first - p[j].first);
        }
        FOR(i, 1, tot) if (p[i].first == Ex && p[i].second == Ey) {
            print(f[i]);
            break;
        }
    }
    return output(), 0;
}

item.title: AGC007E - Shik and Travel
item.description:
Description

ç»™å®šä¸€æ£µäºŒå‰æ ‘ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªéå¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸€å®šæœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªå„¿å­ï¼Œç‚¹æ•° \(n\le 2^{17}\)ã€‚ä»æ ¹ \(1\) å¼€å§‹ï¼Œæ¬§æ‹‰åºéå†è¿™æ£µæ ‘ã€‚èµ°è¿‡è¾¹ä¼šæ¶ˆè€—è¾¹é•¿çš„ä½“åŠ›ã€‚åˆ°è¾¾å¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æ—¶å€™ä½“åŠ›å›æ»¡ï¼Œä¸€å¼€å§‹ä»æ ¹ä¸‹æ¥çš„è¿‡ç¨‹å’Œæœ€åå›æ ¹çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸æ¶ˆè€—ä½“åŠ›ã€‚é—®æœ€å°çš„ä½“åŠ›ã€‚

Solution

\(O(n^3)\) çš„ dp å¹³å‡¡ï¼Œæ³¨æ„åˆ°é—®é¢˜å®é™…ä¸Šè¯´çš„æ˜¯æ±‚ä¸€ä¸ªæ ‘çš„éå†åºï¼Œä½¿å¾—æ‰€æœ‰éå†åºä¸­ç›¸é‚»çš„å¶å­ä¹‹é—´çš„è·ç¦»çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼æœ€å°ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥äºŒåˆ†ç­”æ¡ˆã€‚

ç»§æ‰¿ dp çš„æƒ³æ³•ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘ä¸€ä¸ªå­æ ‘å†… \(u\) åˆæ³•çš„è¿›ç‚¹/å‡ºç‚¹ç‚¹å¯¹é›†åˆ \(S_u\)ï¼Œä»¤å…¶åˆ° \(u\) çš„è·ç¦»å¯¹ä¸º \((a, b)\)ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆå¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¾ç„¶åªæœ‰ \((0, 0)\)ã€‚å¯¹äºéå¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œè®¾å…¶åˆ°å·¦å„¿å­çš„è·ç¦»ä¸º \(x\)ï¼Œåˆ°å³å„¿å­çš„è·ç¦»ä¸º \(y\)ï¼Œåˆ™å·¦å„¿å­çš„ \((a,b)\) èƒ½å’Œå³å„¿å­çš„ \((c,d)\) åˆå¹¶å½“ä¸”ä»…å½“ \(b + x + y + c \le mid\)ï¼Œåˆå¹¶å¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ° \((a + x, d + y)\)ã€‚

ç„¶åæ³¨æ„åˆ°å¯¹äºå­æ ‘ \(u\)ï¼Œè‹¥ \((a_1,b_1)\) å’Œ \((a_2, b_2)\) æ»¡è¶³ \(a_1\le a_2\land b_1\le b_2\)ï¼Œåˆ™ \((a_2, b_2)\) æ˜¯æ²¡æœ‰ç”¨çš„ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä¸¢æ‰ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥ \(S_u\) å°±å˜æˆäº†å…³äº \(a_i\) é€’å¢ï¼Œ\(b_i\) é€’å‡çš„åºåˆ—ã€‚

ç„¶åå°±å¯ä»¥ç”¨åŒæŒ‡é’ˆåˆå¹¶ä¸¤ä¸ªå„¿å­çš„ç­”æ¡ˆã€‚ä¸‹é¢ç»™å‡ºæ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦çš„è¯æ˜ã€‚

å› ä¸ºå¯¹äº \(S_u\) è€Œè¨€ï¼Œå…¶ä¸åŒå–å€¼ä¸€å®šä¸ä¼šè¶…è¿‡å…¶è½»å­æ ‘å†…çš„å¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ªæ•°çš„ \(2\) å€ï¼ˆè€ƒè™‘åˆå¹¶çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼‰ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªå¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹å‡æ‘Šåˆå¹¶ \(O(\log n)\) æ¬¡ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ \(O(n\log n\log{An})\) è§£å†³äº†ã€‚

Implementation

åˆå¹¶çš„è¿‡ç¨‹å®ç°èµ·æ¥è¿˜æ˜¯ç•¥ä¸ºå¤æ‚ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯æˆ‘æ²¡æƒ³åˆ°äºŒåˆ†ç­”æ¡ˆä¹Ÿæ˜¯çº¯å‚»é€¼äº†ã€‚

using ll = long long;
const int maxn = (1 << 17) | 500;
int fa[maxn], ch[maxn][2], len[maxn][2], n;

using pll = pair<ll, ll>;
vector<pll> S[maxn], Sl[maxn], Sr[maxn];

#define fi first
#define se second

bool check(ll mid) {
    DEC(u, n, 1) {
        S[u].clear(), Sl[u].clear(), Sr[u].clear();
        if (!ch[u][0]) {
            S[u].emplace_back(pll(0ll, 0ll));
            continue;
        }
        ll w = mid - len[u][0] - len[u][1];
        vector<pll> &L = S[ch[u][0]], &R = S[ch[u][1]], &lres = Sl[u], &rres = Sr[u], &res = S[u];
        if (L.empty() || R.empty()) return false;
        
        for (auto itL = L.begin(), itR = R.begin(); itL != L.end(); ++itL) {
            while (next(itR) != R.end() && next(itR)->fi + itL->se <= w) ++itR;
            if (itR->fi + itL->se > w) continue;
            lres.emplace_back(pll(itL->fi + len[u][0], itR->se + len[u][1]));
        }
        for (auto itL = L.begin(), itR = R.begin(); itR != R.end(); ++itR) {
            while (next(itL) != L.end() && next(itL)->fi + itR->se <= w) ++itL;
            if (itL->fi + itR->se > w) continue;
            rres.emplace_back(pll(itR->fi + len[u][1], itL->se + len[u][0]));
        }
        for (auto itL = lres.begin(), itR = rres.begin(); itL != lres.end() || itR != rres.end();) {
            if (itR == rres.end() || (itL != lres.end() && itL->fi <= itR->fi)) {
                while (!res.empty() && res.back().fi == itL->fi && res.back().se >= itL->se) res.pop_back();
                if (res.empty() || res.back().se > itL->se) res.emplace_back(*itL);
                ++itL;
            } else {
                while (!res.empty() && res.back().fi == itR->fi && res.back().se >= itR->se) res.pop_back();
                if (res.empty() || res.back().se > itR->se) res.emplace_back(*itR);
                ++itR;
            }
        }
    }
    return !S[1].empty();
}

int main() {
    read(n);
    if (n == 1) {
        print(0);
        return output(), 0;
    }
    FOR(i, 2, n) {
        int p, l; read(p, l);
        if (ch[p][0]) ch[p][1] = i, len[p][1] = l;
        else ch[p][0] = i, len[p][0] = l;
        fa[i] = p;
    }
    ll l = 0, r = (1ll << 17) * 2 * n + 1, ans = r;
    while (l < r) {
        ll mid = (l + r >> 1);
        if (check(mid)) ans = mid, r = mid;
        else l = mid + 1;
    }
    print(ans);
    return output(), 0;
}

item.title: SPOJ GSS ç³»åˆ—é¢˜è§£
item.description:
å‰è¨€

GSS ç³»åˆ—çœŸçš„æ˜¯ååˆ†ç»å…¸çš„é¢˜ã€‚å¼€ä¸ªå‘åšåšã€‚

GSS1 & GSS3

Description

ç»™å®šåºåˆ— \(A_{1,\cdots ,n}\)ï¼Œæ±‚åŒºé—´æœ€å¤§å­æ®µå’Œã€‚GSS1 ä¸å¸¦ä¿®ï¼ŒGSS3 å•ç‚¹ä¿®æ”¹ã€‚

Solution 1

ç”¨çº¿æ®µæ ‘ç»´æŠ¤æœ€å¤§å­æ®µå’Œçš„å¸¸è§å¥—è·¯ï¼šç»´æŠ¤å½“å‰åŒºé—´æœ€å¤§å‰ç¼€ï¼Œæœ€å¤§åç¼€å’Œæœ€å¤§å­æ®µå’Œã€‚åˆå¹¶çš„æ—¶å€™ç®€å•ç»´æŠ¤ã€‚

Solution 2

åŠ¨æ€ dpã€‚è€ƒè™‘è¿™æ ·å®šä¹‰ dp çŠ¶æ€ï¼šè®¾ \(f_i\) ä¸ºä»¥ \(i\) ç»“å°¾çš„æœ€å¤§å­æ®µå’Œï¼Œ\(g_i\) ä¸º \([1,i]\) çš„æœ€å¤§å­æ®µå’Œï¼Œåˆ™æ–¹ç¨‹æ˜“å¾— \[ \begin{cases} f_i = \max\{f_{i - 1} + a_i, a_i\}\\ g_i = \max\{f_i, g_{i - 1}\} \end{cases} \] å°† dp æ–¹ç¨‹å†™æˆ \(\max,+\) çŸ©é˜µä¹˜æ³•çš„å½¢å¼ï¼š \[ \begin{bmatrix} a_i & -\infty & a_i\\ a_i & 0 & a_i\\ -\infty & -\infty & 0 & \end{bmatrix} \otimes \begin{bmatrix} f_{i - 1}\\ g_{i - 1}\\ 0 \end{bmatrix} = \begin{bmatrix} f_{i}\\ g_i\\ 0 \end{bmatrix} \] äºæ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬å°±ç”¨çº¿æ®µæ ‘æ¥ç»´æŠ¤è½¬ç§»çŸ©é˜µ \(\begin{bmatrix}a_i & -\infty & a_i\\a_i & 0 & a_i\\-\infty & -\infty & 0 &\end{bmatrix}\) çš„è¿ä¹˜ç§¯ï¼ˆä½†æ˜¯ä¸€å®šè¦æ³¨æ„æ˜¯ä»å³å¾€å·¦ä¹˜ï¼‰ï¼Œå¯¹äº GSS3 çš„ä¿®æ”¹æ“ä½œå°±ä¿®æ”¹çŸ©é˜µå°±å¯ä»¥äº†ã€‚æŸ¥è¯¢æ“ä½œå°±åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸€ä¸‹ ï¼Œæœ€å³è¾¹çš„çŸ©é˜µè‚¯å®šæ˜¯ \(\begin{bmatrix}a_l\\a_l\\0\end{bmatrix}\)ï¼ŒæŸ¥è¯¢å‡º \([l + 1, r]\) çš„è¿ä¹˜ç§¯å†å·¦ä¹˜ç»™åˆå§‹çŸ©é˜µå°±å¾—è§£äº†ã€‚å®¹æ˜“å‘ç°å•ä½çŸ©é˜µä¸º \(\begin{bmatrix}0 & -\infty & -\infty\\-\infty & 0 & -\infty\\-\infty & -\infty & 0\end{bmatrix}\)ã€‚

GSS2

Description

ä¸å¸¦ä¿®ï¼ŒåŒºé—´æŸ¥è¯¢æœ€å¤§å­æ®µå’Œï¼Œä½†ç›¸åŒçš„æ•°åªè´¡çŒ®ä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚

Solution

GSS4

åŒºé—´å¼€æ–¹åŒºé—´æ±‚å’Œï¼Œåˆå§‹æ—¶ \(\sum A_i\le 10^{18}\)ã€‚

æ³¨æ„åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°è¢«å¼€æ–¹çš„æ¬¡æ•°å…¶å®å¾ˆå°ï¼Œé¡¶å¤š \(6\) æ¬¡å°±ä¼šå˜æˆ \(1\)ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥ä¸å¦¨ç»´æŠ¤åŒºé—´æœ€å¤§å€¼ï¼Œè‹¥åŒºé—´æœ€å¤§å€¼ä¸ä¸º \(1\) åˆ™é€’å½’æš´åŠ›ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œè‹¥ä¸º \(1\) è¯´æ˜ä¸ç”¨ä¿®æ”¹ã€‚

åŠ¿èƒ½åˆ†æå¯å¾—å…¶å¤æ‚åº¦çš„æ­£ç¡®æ€§ã€‚

GSS6

ç»´æŠ¤æ•´æ•°åºåˆ—ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå•ç‚¹æ’å…¥ï¼Œå•ç‚¹åˆ é™¤ï¼Œå•ç‚¹ä¿®æ”¹å€¼ï¼ŒåŒºé—´æœ€å¤§å­æ®µå’Œã€‚

å‘ç°æ‹¿ä¸ªå¹³è¡¡æ ‘åƒ GSS3 é‚£æ ·ç»´æŠ¤å°±å¯ä»¥äº†ã€‚

item.title: AGC010E - Rearranging
item.description:
Description

é¢˜æ„ï¼šç»™å®š \(N\le 2000\) ä¸ªæ•´æ•° \(A_i\)ã€‚å…ˆæ‰‹å°†å…¶ä»»æ„æ‰“ä¹±ï¼Œåæ‰‹å¯ä»¥ä»»æ„æ¬¡äº¤æ¢ä»»æ„ä¸¤ä¸ªç›¸é‚»çš„äº’è´¨çš„æ•°ã€‚å…ˆæ‰‹æƒ³æœ€å°åŒ–å­—å…¸åºï¼Œåæ‰‹æƒ³æœ€å¤§åŒ–å­—å…¸åºï¼ŒåŒæ–¹ç»é¡¶èªæ˜ï¼Œé—®æœ€åç»“æœã€‚

Solution

å…³é”®æ€§è´¨ï¼šå…ˆæ‰‹æ‰“ä¹±æ•°åˆ—ä¹‹åï¼Œä»»æ„ä¸¤ä¸ªä¸äº’è´¨çš„æ•°å¯¹ä¹‹é—´çš„ç›¸å¯¹ä½ç½®éƒ½ä¸ä¼šå‘ç”Ÿæ”¹å˜ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸å¦¨å°†æ‰€æœ‰ä¸äº’è´¨çš„æ•°å¯¹è¿è¾¹ï¼Œç„¶åå…ˆæ‰‹åšçš„äº‹æƒ…å°±æ˜¯ç»™å…¶å®šå‘ï¼ˆæ˜¾ç„¶ä¼šå½¢æˆä¸ª DAGï¼‰ï¼Œè€Œåæ‰‹åšçš„äº‹æƒ…å°±æ˜¯æ‰¾åˆ°è¿™ä¸ª DAG çš„æœ€å¤§å­—å…¸åºçš„æ‹“æ‰‘åºã€‚

ä¸ºäº†è®©å­—å…¸åºå°½å¯èƒ½å°ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å…ˆå°† \(A_i\) æ’åºï¼Œç„¶åè´ªå¿ƒåœ° dfs ç»™è¾¹å®šå‘ã€‚ç„¶åå†éšä¾¿æ‰¾æ‰¾å…¶æœ€å¤§æ‹“æ‰‘åºå³å¯ã€‚

Implementation

const int maxn = 2005;
int a[maxn], n, mp[maxn][maxn], vis[maxn], ind[maxn];
vector<int> G[maxn];

void dfs(int u) {
    vis[u] = 1;
    FOR(v, 1, n) {
        if (vis[v] || !mp[u][v]) continue;
        G[u].push_back(v), ++ind[v];
        dfs(v);
    }
    return;
}

void toposort() {
    priority_queue<int> q;
    FOR(i, 1, n) if (!ind[i]) q.push(i);
    while (!q.empty()) {
        int u = q.top(); q.pop();
        print(a[u], ' ');
        for (auto &v : G[u]) if (!--ind[v]) q.push(v);
    }
    return;
}

int main() {
    read(n);
    FOR(i, 1, n) read(a[i]);
    sort(a + 1, a + n + 1);
    FOR(i, 1, n) FOR(j, 1, n) if (__gcd(a[i], a[j]) > 1) mp[i][j] = mp[j][i] = 1;
    FOR(i, 1, n) if (!vis[i]) dfs(i);
    toposort();
    return output(), 0;
}

item.title: P5631 æœ€å°mexç”Ÿæˆæ ‘
item.description:
Description

ç»™å®šä¸€å¼ æ— å‘è¿é€šå¸¦æƒå›¾ï¼Œé—®å…¶æœ€å° mex ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘ã€‚å³è¦æ±‚ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘çš„æ‰€æœ‰è¾¹æƒçš„ mex æœ€å°ã€‚

\(1\le n\le 10^6\)ï¼Œ\(1\le m\le 2\times 10^6\)ï¼Œ\(0\le w\le 10^5\)ã€‚

Solution

orzï¼Œä¸ºå•¥ä¿© \(\log\) èƒ½è¿‡ã€‚

é¦–å…ˆå¯ä»¥è€ƒè™‘æšä¸¾ç­”æ¡ˆï¼Œå³æšä¸¾è¿™ä¸ª mexï¼Œç„¶åå°±åªéœ€è¦å°†å›¾ä¸­è¾¹æƒç­‰äºè¿™ä¸ª mex çš„è¾¹å…¨éƒ¨åˆ æ‰å†çœ‹å›¾æ˜¯å¦è¿é€šã€‚

ä½†æ˜¯è¿™æ ·åšæ˜¯ \(O(wm\log n)\) çš„ï¼Œé“å®šè¿‡ä¸å»ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘èƒ½å¦ä¼˜åŒ–â€œåˆ¤æ–­å›¾æ˜¯å¦è¿é€šâ€è¿™ä¸ªè¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚

ç”±äº \(w\) è¾ƒå°ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è€ƒè™‘ä¸€ä¸ªçº¿æ®µæ ‘åˆ†æ²»ï¼Œå°†è¾¹æƒä¸º \(x\) çš„è¾¹æŒ‚åœ¨çº¿æ®µæ ‘ \([1, x - 1]\) å’Œ \([x + 1, \max]\) çš„åŒºé—´ä¸Šã€‚ç„¶åé€’å½’è¿›çº¿æ®µæ ‘ï¼Œè¿›ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹å°±åŠ ä¸Šè¿™äº›èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„è¾¹ï¼Œç„¶ååˆ°äº†å¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹åè‡ªç„¶é™¤äº†è¾¹æƒä¸º \(x\) çš„è¾¹å¤–å…¶ä»–éƒ½åŠ ä¸Šäº†ï¼Œç›´æ¥åˆ¤æ–­å°±å¯ä»¥äº†ã€‚

å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸º \(O(m\log n\log w)\)ã€‚

Implementation

ç©ºé—´éœ€è¦å¡ä¸€å¡ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚è¿˜æœ‰æ³¨æ„çº¿æ®µæ ‘ä¸‹æ ‡åŒºé—´åº”ä¸º \([0, \max w + 1]\)ï¼Œä¿è¯æœå¾—åˆ°è§£ã€‚

ç„¶åéœ€è¦åŠ å‰ªæä¸ç„¶å¾ˆå®¹æ˜“å¯„ã€‚

using pii = pair<int, int>;
const int maxn = 1e6 + 5, maxm = 2e6 + 5, maxw = 1e5 + 5;
int n, m, W;

struct Edge {
    int u, v, w;
} e[maxm];

vector<int> t[maxw << 2];

struct UnionFind {
    int top, fa[maxn], sz[maxn], tot, stk[maxn];
    void init() {
        FOR(i, 1, n) fa[i] = i, sz[i] = 1;
        top = 0, tot = n;
    }
    int find(int x) {return fa[x] == x ? x : find(fa[x]);}
    il bool ask(int x, int y) {return find(x) == find(y);}
    void merge(int x, int y) {
        x = find(x), y = find(y);
        if (x == y) return;
        if (sz[x] > sz[y]) swap(x, y);
        fa[x] = y, sz[y] += sz[x], --tot;
